contentJson: [{"text":"These are the proverbs of Solomon son of David,","poem":1},{"text":"king of Israel,","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: These are the proverbs of Solomon son of David, king of Israel,

contentJson: [{"text":"for gaining wisdom and discipline,","poem":1},{"text":"for comprehending words of insight,","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: for gaining wisdom and discipline, for comprehending words of insight,

contentJson: [{"text":"and for receiving instruction in wise living","poem":1},{"text":"and in righteousness, justice, and equity.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: and for receiving instruction in wise living and in righteousness, justice, and equity.

contentJson: [{"text":"To impart prudence to the simple","poem":1},{"noteId":0},{"text":"and knowledge and discretion to the young,","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: To impart prudence to the simple and knowledge and discretion to the young,

contentJson: [{"text":"let the wise listen and gain instruction,","poem":1},{"text":"and the discerning acquire wise counsel","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: let the wise listen and gain instruction, and the discerning acquire wise counsel

contentJson: [{"text":"by understanding the proverbs and parables,","poem":1},{"text":"the sayings and riddles of the wise.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: by understanding the proverbs and parables, the sayings and riddles of the wise.

contentJson: [{"text":"The fear of the LORD is the beginning of knowledge,","poem":1},{"text":"but fools","poem":2},{"noteId":1},{"text":"despise wisdom and discipline.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The fear of the LORD is the beginning of knowledge, but fools despise wisdom and discipline.

contentJson: [{"text":"Listen, my son, to your father’s instruction,","poem":1},{"text":"and do not forsake the teaching of your mother.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Listen, my son, to your father’s instruction, and do not forsake the teaching of your mother.

contentJson: [{"text":"For they are a garland of grace on your head","poem":1},{"text":"and a pendant around your neck.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: For they are a garland of grace on your head and a pendant around your neck.

contentJson: [{"text":"My son, if sinners entice you,","poem":1},{"text":"do not yield to them.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: My son, if sinners entice you, do not yield to them.

contentJson: [{"text":"If they say, “Come along, let us lie in wait for blood,","poem":1},{"text":"let us ambush the innocent without cause,","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: If they say, “Come along, let us lie in wait for blood, let us ambush the innocent without cause,

contentJson: [{"text":"let us swallow them alive like Sheol,","poem":1},{"text":"and whole like those descending into the Pit.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: let us swallow them alive like Sheol, and whole like those descending into the Pit.

contentJson: [{"text":"We will find all manner of precious goods;","poem":1},{"text":"we will fill our houses with plunder.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: We will find all manner of precious goods; we will fill our houses with plunder.

contentJson: [{"text":"Throw in your lot with us;","poem":1},{"text":"let us all share one purse”—","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Throw in your lot with us; let us all share one purse”—

contentJson: [{"text":"my son, do not walk the road with them","poem":1},{"text":"or set foot upon their path.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: my son, do not walk the road with them or set foot upon their path.

contentJson: [{"text":"For their feet run to evil,","poem":1},{"text":"and they are swift to shed blood.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: For their feet run to evil, and they are swift to shed blood.

contentJson: [{"text":"How futile it is to spread the net","poem":1},{"text":"where any bird can see it!","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: How futile it is to spread the net where any bird can see it!

contentJson: [{"text":"But they lie in wait for their own blood;","poem":1},{"text":"they ambush their own lives.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: But they lie in wait for their own blood; they ambush their own lives.

contentJson: [{"text":"Such is the fate of all who are greedy,","poem":1},{"text":"whose unjust gain takes the lives of its possessors.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Such is the fate of all who are greedy, whose unjust gain takes the lives of its possessors.

contentJson: [{"text":"Wisdom calls out in the street,","poem":1},{"text":"she lifts her voice in the square;","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Wisdom calls out in the street, she lifts her voice in the square;

contentJson: [{"text":"in the main concourse","poem":1},{"noteId":2},{"text":"she cries aloud,","poem":1},{"text":"at the city gates she makes her speech:","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: in the main concourse she cries aloud, at the city gates she makes her speech:

contentJson: [{"text":"“How long, O simple ones, will you love your simple ways?","poem":1},{"text":"How long will scoffers delight in their scorn","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"and fools hate knowledge?","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
“How long, O simple ones, will you love your simple ways? How long will scoffers delight in their scorn 
and fools hate knowledge?

contentJson: [{"text":"If you had repented at my rebuke,","poem":1},{"text":"then surely I would have poured out my spirit on you;","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"I would have made my words known to you.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
If you had repented at my rebuke, then surely I would have poured out my spirit on you; 
I would have made my words known to you.

contentJson: [{"text":"Because you refused my call,","poem":1},{"text":"and no one took my outstretched hand,","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Because you refused my call, and no one took my outstretched hand,

contentJson: [{"text":"because you neglected all my counsel,","poem":1},{"text":"and wanted none of my correction,","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: because you neglected all my counsel, and wanted none of my correction,

contentJson: [{"text":"in turn I will mock your calamity;","poem":1},{"text":"I will sneer when terror strikes you,","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: in turn I will mock your calamity; I will sneer when terror strikes you,

contentJson: [{"text":"when your dread comes like a storm,","poem":1},{"text":"and your destruction like a whirlwind,","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"when distress and anguish overwhelm you.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
when your dread comes like a storm, and your destruction like a whirlwind, 
when distress and anguish overwhelm you.

contentJson: [{"text":"Then they will call on me, but I will not answer;","poem":1},{"text":"they will earnestly seek me, but will not find me.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Then they will call on me, but I will not answer; they will earnestly seek me, but will not find me.

contentJson: [{"text":"For they hated knowledge","poem":1},{"text":"and chose not to fear the LORD.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: For they hated knowledge and chose not to fear the LORD.

contentJson: [{"text":"They accepted none of my counsel;","poem":1},{"text":"they despised all my reproof.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: They accepted none of my counsel; they despised all my reproof.

contentJson: [{"text":"So they will eat the fruit of their own way,","poem":1},{"text":"and be filled with their own devices.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: So they will eat the fruit of their own way, and be filled with their own devices.

contentJson: [{"text":"For the waywardness of the simple will slay them,","poem":1},{"text":"and the complacency of fools will destroy them.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: For the waywardness of the simple will slay them, and the complacency of fools will destroy them.

contentJson: [{"text":"But whoever listens to me will dwell in safety,","poem":1},{"text":"secure from the fear of evil.”","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: But whoever listens to me will dwell in safety, secure from the fear of evil.”

contentJson: [{"text":"My son, if you accept my words","poem":1},{"text":"and hide my commandments within you,","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: My son, if you accept my words and hide my commandments within you,

contentJson: [{"text":"if you incline your ear to wisdom","poem":1},{"text":"and direct your heart to understanding,","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: if you incline your ear to wisdom and direct your heart to understanding,

contentJson: [{"text":"if you truly call out to insight","poem":1},{"text":"and lift your voice to understanding,","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: if you truly call out to insight and lift your voice to understanding,

contentJson: [{"text":"if you seek it like silver","poem":1},{"text":"and search it out like hidden treasure,","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: if you seek it like silver and search it out like hidden treasure,

contentJson: [{"text":"then you will discern the fear of the LORD","poem":1},{"text":"and discover the knowledge of God.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: then you will discern the fear of the LORD and discover the knowledge of God.

contentJson: [{"text":"For the LORD gives wisdom;","poem":1},{"text":"from His mouth come knowledge and understanding.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: For the LORD gives wisdom; from His mouth come knowledge and understanding.

contentJson: [{"text":"He stores up sound wisdom for the upright;","poem":1},{"text":"He is a shield to those who walk with integrity,","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: He stores up sound wisdom for the upright; He is a shield to those who walk with integrity,

contentJson: [{"text":"to guard the paths of justice","poem":1},{"text":"and protect the way of His saints.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: to guard the paths of justice and protect the way of His saints.

contentJson: [{"text":"Then you will discern righteousness","poem":1},{"text":"and justice and equity—every good path.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Then you will discern righteousness and justice and equity—every good path.

contentJson: [{"text":"For wisdom will enter your heart,","poem":1},{"text":"and knowledge will delight your soul.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: For wisdom will enter your heart, and knowledge will delight your soul.

contentJson: [{"text":"Discretion will watch over you,","poem":1},{"text":"and understanding will guard you,","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Discretion will watch over you, and understanding will guard you,

contentJson: [{"text":"to deliver you from the way of evil,","poem":1},{"text":"from the man who speaks perversity,","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: to deliver you from the way of evil, from the man who speaks perversity,

contentJson: [{"text":"from those who leave the straight paths","poem":1},{"text":"to walk in the ways of darkness,","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: from those who leave the straight paths to walk in the ways of darkness,

contentJson: [{"text":"from those who enjoy doing evil","poem":1},{"text":"and rejoice in the twistedness of evil,","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: from those who enjoy doing evil and rejoice in the twistedness of evil,

contentJson: [{"text":"whose paths are crooked","poem":1},{"text":"and whose ways are devious.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: whose paths are crooked and whose ways are devious.

contentJson: [{"text":"It will rescue you from the forbidden woman,","poem":1},{"noteId":3},{"text":"from the stranger","poem":2},{"noteId":4},{"text":"with seductive words","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: It will rescue you from the forbidden woman, from the stranger with seductive words

contentJson: [{"text":"who abandons the partner of her youth","poem":1},{"text":"and forgets the covenant of her God.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: who abandons the partner of her youth and forgets the covenant of her God.

contentJson: [{"text":"For her house sinks down to death,","poem":1},{"text":"and her tracks to the departed spirits.","poem":2},{"noteId":5}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: For her house sinks down to death, and her tracks to the departed spirits.

contentJson: [{"text":"None who go to her return","poem":1},{"text":"or negotiate the paths of life.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: None who go to her return or negotiate the paths of life.

contentJson: [{"text":"So you will follow in the ways of the good,","poem":1},{"text":"and keep to the paths of the righteous.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: So you will follow in the ways of the good, and keep to the paths of the righteous.

contentJson: [{"text":"For the upright will inhabit the land,","poem":1},{"text":"and the blameless will remain in it;","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: For the upright will inhabit the land, and the blameless will remain in it;

contentJson: [{"text":"but the wicked will be cut off from the land,","poem":1},{"text":"and the unfaithful will be uprooted.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: but the wicked will be cut off from the land, and the unfaithful will be uprooted.

contentJson: [{"text":"My son, do not forget my teaching,","poem":1},{"text":"but let your heart keep my commandments;","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: My son, do not forget my teaching, but let your heart keep my commandments;

contentJson: [{"text":"for they will add length to your days,","poem":1},{"text":"years and peace to your life.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: for they will add length to your days, years and peace to your life.

contentJson: [{"text":"Never let loving devotion","poem":1},{"noteId":6},{"text":"or faithfulness leave you;","poem":1},{"text":"bind them around your neck,","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"write them on the tablet of your heart.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
Never let loving devotion or faithfulness leave you; bind them around your neck, 
write them on the tablet of your heart.

contentJson: [{"text":"Then you will find favor and high regard","poem":1},{"text":"in the sight of God and man.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Then you will find favor and high regard in the sight of God and man.

contentJson: [{"text":"Trust in the LORD with all your heart,","poem":1},{"text":"and lean not on your own understanding;","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Trust in the LORD with all your heart, and lean not on your own understanding;

contentJson: [{"text":"in all your ways acknowledge Him,","poem":1},{"text":"and He will make your paths straight.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: in all your ways acknowledge Him, and He will make your paths straight.

contentJson: [{"text":"Be not wise in your own eyes;","poem":1},{"text":"fear the LORD and turn away from evil.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Be not wise in your own eyes; fear the LORD and turn away from evil.

contentJson: [{"text":"This will bring healing to your body","poem":1},{"noteId":7},{"text":"and refreshment","poem":2},{"noteId":8},{"text":"to your bones.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: This will bring healing to your body and refreshment to your bones.

contentJson: [{"text":"Honor the LORD with your wealth","poem":1},{"text":"and with the firstfruits of all your harvest;","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Honor the LORD with your wealth and with the firstfruits of all your harvest;

contentJson: [{"text":"then your barns will be filled with plenty,","poem":1},{"text":"and your vats will overflow with new wine.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: then your barns will be filled with plenty, and your vats will overflow with new wine.

contentJson: [{"text":"My son, do not reject the discipline of the LORD,","poem":1},{"text":"and do not loathe His rebuke;","poem":2},{"noteId":9}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: My son, do not reject the discipline of the LORD, and do not loathe His rebuke;

contentJson: [{"text":"for the LORD disciplines the one He loves,","poem":1},{"text":"as does a father the son in whom he delights.","poem":2},{"noteId":10}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: for the LORD disciplines the one He loves, as does a father the son in whom he delights.

contentJson: [{"text":"Blessed is the man who finds wisdom,","poem":1},{"text":"the man who acquires understanding,","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Blessed is the man who finds wisdom, the man who acquires understanding,

contentJson: [{"text":"for she is more profitable than silver,","poem":1},{"text":"and her gain is better than fine gold.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: for she is more profitable than silver, and her gain is better than fine gold.

contentJson: [{"text":"She is more precious than rubies;","poem":1},{"text":"nothing you desire compares with her.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: She is more precious than rubies; nothing you desire compares with her.

contentJson: [{"text":"Long life is in her right hand;","poem":1},{"text":"in her left hand are riches and honor.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Long life is in her right hand; in her left hand are riches and honor.

contentJson: [{"text":"All her ways are pleasant,","poem":1},{"text":"and all her paths are peaceful.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: All her ways are pleasant, and all her paths are peaceful.

contentJson: [{"text":"She is a tree of life to those who embrace her,","poem":1},{"text":"and those who lay hold of her are blessed.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: She is a tree of life to those who embrace her, and those who lay hold of her are blessed.

contentJson: [{"text":"The LORD founded the earth by wisdom","poem":1},{"text":"and established the heavens by understanding.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The LORD founded the earth by wisdom and established the heavens by understanding.

contentJson: [{"text":"By His knowledge the watery depths were broken open,","poem":1},{"text":"and the clouds dripped with dew.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: By His knowledge the watery depths were broken open, and the clouds dripped with dew.

contentJson: [{"text":"My son, do not lose sight of this:","poem":1},{"text":"Preserve sound judgment and discernment.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: My son, do not lose sight of this: Preserve sound judgment and discernment.

contentJson: [{"text":"They will be life to your soul","poem":1},{"text":"and adornment to your neck.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: They will be life to your soul and adornment to your neck.

contentJson: [{"text":"Then you will go on your way in safety,","poem":1},{"text":"and your foot will not stumble.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Then you will go on your way in safety, and your foot will not stumble.

contentJson: [{"text":"When you lie down, you will not be afraid;","poem":1},{"text":"when you rest, your sleep will be sweet.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: When you lie down, you will not be afraid; when you rest, your sleep will be sweet.

contentJson: [{"text":"Do not fear sudden danger","poem":1},{"text":"or the ruin that overtakes the wicked,","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Do not fear sudden danger or the ruin that overtakes the wicked,

contentJson: [{"text":"for the LORD will be your confidence","poem":1},{"text":"and will keep your foot from the snare.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: for the LORD will be your confidence and will keep your foot from the snare.

contentJson: [{"text":"Do not withhold good from the deserving","poem":1},{"noteId":11},{"text":"when it is within your power to act.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Do not withhold good from the deserving when it is within your power to act.

contentJson: [{"text":"Do not tell your neighbor,","poem":1},{"text":"“Come back tomorrow and I will provide”—","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"when you already have the means.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
Do not tell your neighbor, “Come back tomorrow and I will provide”— 
when you already have the means.

contentJson: [{"text":"Do not devise evil against your neighbor,","poem":1},{"text":"for he trustfully dwells beside you.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Do not devise evil against your neighbor, for he trustfully dwells beside you.

contentJson: [{"text":"Do not accuse a man without cause,","poem":1},{"text":"when he has done you no harm.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Do not accuse a man without cause, when he has done you no harm.

contentJson: [{"text":"Do not envy a violent man","poem":1},{"text":"or choose any of his ways;","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Do not envy a violent man or choose any of his ways;

contentJson: [{"text":"for the LORD detests the perverse,","poem":1},{"text":"but He is a friend to the upright.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: for the LORD detests the perverse, but He is a friend to the upright.

contentJson: [{"text":"The curse of the LORD is on the house of the wicked,","poem":1},{"text":"but He blesses the home of the righteous.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The curse of the LORD is on the house of the wicked, but He blesses the home of the righteous.

contentJson: [{"text":"He mocks the mockers,","poem":1},{"text":"but gives grace to the humble.","poem":2},{"noteId":12}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: He mocks the mockers, but gives grace to the humble.

contentJson: [{"text":"The wise will inherit honor,","poem":1},{"text":"but fools are held up to shame.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The wise will inherit honor, but fools are held up to shame.

contentJson: [{"text":"Listen, my sons, to a father’s instruction;","poem":1},{"text":"pay attention and gain understanding.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Listen, my sons, to a father’s instruction; pay attention and gain understanding.

contentJson: [{"text":"For I give you sound teaching;","poem":1},{"text":"do not abandon my directive.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: For I give you sound teaching; do not abandon my directive.

contentJson: [{"text":"When I was a son to my father,","poem":1},{"text":"tender and the only child of my mother,","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: When I was a son to my father, tender and the only child of my mother,

contentJson: [{"text":"he taught me and said,","poem":1},{"text":"“Let your heart lay hold of my words;","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"keep my commands and you will live.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
he taught me and said, “Let your heart lay hold of my words; 
keep my commands and you will live.

contentJson: [{"text":"Get wisdom, get understanding;","poem":1},{"text":"do not forget my words or turn from them.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Get wisdom, get understanding; do not forget my words or turn from them.

contentJson: [{"text":"Do not forsake wisdom, and she will preserve you;","poem":1},{"text":"love her, and she will guard you.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Do not forsake wisdom, and she will preserve you; love her, and she will guard you.

contentJson: [{"text":"Wisdom is supreme; so acquire wisdom.","poem":1},{"text":"And whatever you may acquire,","poem":2},{"noteId":13},{"text":"gain understanding.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Wisdom is supreme; so acquire wisdom. And whatever you may acquire, gain understanding.

contentJson: [{"text":"Prize her, and she will exalt you;","poem":1},{"text":"if you embrace her, she will honor you.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Prize her, and she will exalt you; if you embrace her, she will honor you.

contentJson: [{"text":"She will set a garland of grace on your head;","poem":1},{"text":"she will present you with a crown of beauty.”","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: She will set a garland of grace on your head; she will present you with a crown of beauty.”

contentJson: [{"text":"Listen, my son, and receive my words,","poem":1},{"text":"and the years of your life will be many.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Listen, my son, and receive my words, and the years of your life will be many.

contentJson: [{"text":"I will guide you in the way of wisdom;","poem":1},{"text":"I will lead you on straight paths.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: I will guide you in the way of wisdom; I will lead you on straight paths.

contentJson: [{"text":"When you walk, your steps will not be impeded;","poem":1},{"text":"when you run, you will not stumble.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: When you walk, your steps will not be impeded; when you run, you will not stumble.

contentJson: [{"text":"Hold on to instruction; do not let go.","poem":1},{"text":"Guard it, for it is your life.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Hold on to instruction; do not let go. Guard it, for it is your life.

contentJson: [{"text":"Do not set foot on the path of the wicked","poem":1},{"text":"or walk in the way of evildoers.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Do not set foot on the path of the wicked or walk in the way of evildoers.

contentJson: [{"text":"Avoid it; do not travel on it.","poem":1},{"text":"Turn from it and pass on by.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Avoid it; do not travel on it. Turn from it and pass on by.

contentJson: [{"text":"For they cannot sleep","poem":1},{"text":"unless they do evil;","poem":2},{"text":"they are deprived of slumber","poem":1},{"text":"until they make someone fall.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: For they cannot sleep unless they do evil; they are deprived of slumber until they make someone fall.

contentJson: [{"text":"For they eat the bread of wickedness","poem":1},{"text":"and drink the wine of violence.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: For they eat the bread of wickedness and drink the wine of violence.

contentJson: [{"text":"The path of the righteous is like the first gleam of dawn,","poem":1},{"text":"shining brighter and brighter until midday.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The path of the righteous is like the first gleam of dawn, shining brighter and brighter until midday.

contentJson: [{"text":"But the way of the wicked is like the darkest gloom;","poem":1},{"text":"they do not know what makes them stumble.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: But the way of the wicked is like the darkest gloom; they do not know what makes them stumble.

contentJson: [{"text":"My son, pay attention to my words;","poem":1},{"text":"incline your ear to my sayings.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: My son, pay attention to my words; incline your ear to my sayings.

contentJson: [{"text":"Do not lose sight of them;","poem":1},{"text":"keep them within your heart.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Do not lose sight of them; keep them within your heart.

contentJson: [{"text":"For they are life to those who find them,","poem":1},{"text":"and health to the whole body.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: For they are life to those who find them, and health to the whole body.

contentJson: [{"text":"Guard your heart with all diligence,","poem":1},{"text":"for from it flow springs of life.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Guard your heart with all diligence, for from it flow springs of life.

contentJson: [{"text":"Put away deception from your mouth;","poem":1},{"text":"keep your lips from perverse speech.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Put away deception from your mouth; keep your lips from perverse speech.

contentJson: [{"text":"Let your eyes look forward;","poem":1},{"text":"fix your gaze straight ahead.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Let your eyes look forward; fix your gaze straight ahead.

contentJson: [{"text":"Make a level path for your feet,","poem":1},{"noteId":14},{"text":"and all your ways will be sure.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Make a level path for your feet, and all your ways will be sure.

contentJson: [{"text":"Do not swerve to the right or to the left;","poem":1},{"text":"turn your feet away from evil.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Do not swerve to the right or to the left; turn your feet away from evil.

contentJson: [{"text":"My son, pay attention to my wisdom;","poem":1},{"text":"incline your ear to my insight,","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: My son, pay attention to my wisdom; incline your ear to my insight,

contentJson: [{"text":"that you may maintain discretion","poem":1},{"text":"and your lips may preserve knowledge.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: that you may maintain discretion and your lips may preserve knowledge.

contentJson: [{"text":"Though the lips of the forbidden woman","poem":1},{"noteId":15},{"text":"drip honey","poem":1},{"text":"and her speech","poem":2},{"noteId":16},{"text":"is smoother than oil,","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Though the lips of the forbidden woman drip honey and her speech is smoother than oil,

contentJson: [{"text":"in the end she is bitter as wormwood,","poem":1},{"text":"sharp as a double-edged sword.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: in the end she is bitter as wormwood, sharp as a double-edged sword.

contentJson: [{"text":"Her feet go down to death;","poem":1},{"text":"her steps lead straight to Sheol.","poem":2},{"noteId":17}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Her feet go down to death; her steps lead straight to Sheol.

contentJson: [{"text":"She does not consider the path of life;","poem":1},{"text":"she does not know that her ways are unstable.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: She does not consider the path of life; she does not know that her ways are unstable.

contentJson: [{"text":"So now, my sons, listen to me,","poem":1},{"text":"and do not turn aside from the words of my mouth.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: So now, my sons, listen to me, and do not turn aside from the words of my mouth.

contentJson: [{"text":"Keep your path far from her;","poem":1},{"text":"do not go near the door of her house,","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Keep your path far from her; do not go near the door of her house,

contentJson: [{"text":"lest you concede your vigor to others,","poem":1},{"text":"and your years to one who is cruel;","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: lest you concede your vigor to others, and your years to one who is cruel;

contentJson: [{"text":"lest strangers feast on your wealth,","poem":1},{"text":"and your labors enrich the house of a foreigner.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: lest strangers feast on your wealth, and your labors enrich the house of a foreigner.

contentJson: [{"text":"At the end of your life you will groan","poem":1},{"text":"when your flesh and your body are spent,","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: At the end of your life you will groan when your flesh and your body are spent,

contentJson: [{"text":"and you will say, “How I hated discipline,","poem":1},{"text":"and my heart despised reproof!","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: and you will say, “How I hated discipline, and my heart despised reproof!

contentJson: [{"text":"I did not listen to the voice of my teachers","poem":1},{"text":"or incline my ear to my mentors.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: I did not listen to the voice of my teachers or incline my ear to my mentors.

contentJson: [{"text":"I am on the brink of utter ruin","poem":1},{"text":"in the midst of the whole assembly.”","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: I am on the brink of utter ruin in the midst of the whole assembly.”

contentJson: [{"text":"Drink water from your own cistern,","poem":1},{"text":"and running water from your own well.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Drink water from your own cistern, and running water from your own well.

contentJson: [{"text":"Why should your springs flow in the streets,","poem":1},{"text":"your streams of water in the public squares?","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Why should your springs flow in the streets, your streams of water in the public squares?

contentJson: [{"text":"Let them be yours alone,","poem":1},{"text":"never to be shared with strangers.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Let them be yours alone, never to be shared with strangers.

contentJson: [{"text":"May your fountain be blessed,","poem":1},{"text":"and may you rejoice in the wife of your youth:","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: May your fountain be blessed, and may you rejoice in the wife of your youth:

contentJson: [{"text":"A loving doe, a graceful fawn—","poem":1},{"text":"may her breasts satisfy you always;","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"may you be captivated","poem":2},{"noteId":18},{"text":"by her love forever.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
A loving doe, a graceful fawn— may her breasts satisfy you always; 
may you be captivated by her love forever.

contentJson: [{"text":"Why be captivated, my son, by an adulteress,","poem":1},{"text":"or embrace the bosom of a stranger?","poem":2},{"noteId":19}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Why be captivated, my son, by an adulteress, or embrace the bosom of a stranger?

contentJson: [{"text":"For a man’s ways are before the eyes of the LORD,","poem":1},{"text":"and the LORD examines","poem":2},{"noteId":20},{"text":"all his paths.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: For a man’s ways are before the eyes of the LORD, and the LORD examines all his paths.

contentJson: [{"text":"The iniquities of a wicked man entrap him;","poem":1},{"text":"the cords of his sin entangle him.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The iniquities of a wicked man entrap him; the cords of his sin entangle him.

contentJson: [{"text":"He dies for lack of discipline,","poem":1},{"text":"led astray by his own great folly.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: He dies for lack of discipline, led astray by his own great folly.

contentJson: [{"text":"My son, if you have put up security for your neighbor,","poem":1},{"text":"if you have struck hands in pledge with a stranger,","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: My son, if you have put up security for your neighbor, if you have struck hands in pledge with a stranger,

contentJson: [{"text":"if you have been trapped by the words of your lips,","poem":1},{"text":"ensnared by the words of your mouth,","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: if you have been trapped by the words of your lips, ensnared by the words of your mouth,

contentJson: [{"text":"then do this, my son, to free yourself,","poem":1},{"text":"for you have fallen into your neighbor’s hands:","poem":2},{"text":"Go, humble yourself,","poem":1},{"noteId":21},{"text":"and press your plea with your neighbor.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: then do this, my son, to free yourself, for you have fallen into your neighbor’s hands: Go, humble yourself, and press your plea with your neighbor.

contentJson: [{"text":"Allow no sleep to your eyes","poem":1},{"text":"or slumber to your eyelids.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Allow no sleep to your eyes or slumber to your eyelids.

contentJson: [{"text":"Free yourself, like a gazelle from the hand of the hunter,","poem":1},{"noteId":22},{"text":"like a bird from the snare of the fowler.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Free yourself, like a gazelle from the hand of the hunter, like a bird from the snare of the fowler.

contentJson: [{"text":"Walk in the manner of the ant, O slacker;","poem":1},{"text":"observe its ways and become wise.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Walk in the manner of the ant, O slacker; observe its ways and become wise.

contentJson: [{"text":"Without a commander,","poem":1},{"text":"without an overseer or ruler,","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Without a commander, without an overseer or ruler,

contentJson: [{"text":"it prepares its provisions in summer;","poem":1},{"text":"it gathers its food at harvest.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: it prepares its provisions in summer; it gathers its food at harvest.

contentJson: [{"text":"How long will you lie there, O slacker?","poem":1},{"text":"When will you get up from your sleep?","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: How long will you lie there, O slacker? When will you get up from your sleep?

contentJson: [{"text":"A little sleep, a little slumber,","poem":1},{"text":"a little folding of the hands to rest,","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: A little sleep, a little slumber, a little folding of the hands to rest,

contentJson: [{"text":"and poverty will come upon you like a robber,","poem":1},{"text":"and need like a bandit.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: and poverty will come upon you like a robber, and need like a bandit.

contentJson: [{"text":"A worthless person, a wicked man,","poem":1},{"text":"walks with a perverse mouth,","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: A worthless person, a wicked man, walks with a perverse mouth,

contentJson: [{"text":"winking his eyes, speaking with his feet,","poem":1},{"text":"and pointing with his fingers.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: winking his eyes, speaking with his feet, and pointing with his fingers.

contentJson: [{"text":"With deceit in his heart he devises evil;","poem":1},{"text":"he continually sows discord.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: With deceit in his heart he devises evil; he continually sows discord.

contentJson: [{"text":"Therefore calamity will come upon him suddenly;","poem":1},{"text":"in an instant he will be shattered beyond recovery.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Therefore calamity will come upon him suddenly; in an instant he will be shattered beyond recovery.

contentJson: ["There are six things that the LORD hates, seven that are detestable to Him:"]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: There are six things that the LORD hates, seven that are detestable to Him:

contentJson: ["haughty eyes,",{"lineBreak":true},"a lying tongue,",{"lineBreak":true},"hands that shed innocent blood,"]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
haughty eyes, 
a lying tongue, 
hands that shed innocent blood,

contentJson: ["a heart that devises wicked schemes,",{"lineBreak":true},"feet that run swiftly to evil,"]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
a heart that devises wicked schemes, 
feet that run swiftly to evil,

contentJson: ["a false witness who gives false testimony,",{"lineBreak":true},"and one who stirs up discord among brothers."]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
a false witness who gives false testimony, 
and one who stirs up discord among brothers.

contentJson: [{"text":"My son, keep your father’s commandment,","poem":1},{"text":"and do not forsake your mother’s teaching.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: My son, keep your father’s commandment, and do not forsake your mother’s teaching.

contentJson: [{"text":"Bind them always upon your heart;","poem":1},{"text":"tie them around your neck.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Bind them always upon your heart; tie them around your neck.

contentJson: [{"text":"When you walk, they will guide you;","poem":1},{"text":"when you lie down, they will watch over you;","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"when you awake, they will speak to you.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
When you walk, they will guide you; when you lie down, they will watch over you; 
when you awake, they will speak to you.

contentJson: [{"text":"For this commandment is a lamp, this teaching is a light,","poem":1},{"text":"and the reproofs of discipline are the way to life,","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: For this commandment is a lamp, this teaching is a light, and the reproofs of discipline are the way to life,

contentJson: [{"text":"to keep you from the evil woman,","poem":1},{"text":"from the smooth tongue of the adulteress.","poem":2},{"noteId":23}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: to keep you from the evil woman, from the smooth tongue of the adulteress.

contentJson: [{"text":"Do not lust in your heart for her beauty","poem":1},{"text":"or let her captivate you with her eyes.","poem":2},{"noteId":24}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Do not lust in your heart for her beauty or let her captivate you with her eyes.

contentJson: [{"text":"For the levy of the prostitute is poverty,","poem":1},{"noteId":25},{"text":"and the adulteress preys upon your very life.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: For the levy of the prostitute is poverty, and the adulteress preys upon your very life.

contentJson: [{"text":"Can a man embrace fire","poem":1},{"text":"and his clothes not be burned?","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Can a man embrace fire and his clothes not be burned?

contentJson: [{"text":"Can a man walk on hot coals","poem":1},{"text":"without scorching his feet?","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Can a man walk on hot coals without scorching his feet?

contentJson: [{"text":"So is he who sleeps with another man’s wife;","poem":1},{"text":"no one who touches her will go unpunished.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: So is he who sleeps with another man’s wife; no one who touches her will go unpunished.

contentJson: [{"text":"Men do not despise the thief","poem":1},{"text":"if he steals to satisfy his hunger.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Men do not despise the thief if he steals to satisfy his hunger.

contentJson: [{"text":"Yet if caught, he must pay sevenfold;","poem":1},{"text":"he must give up all the wealth of his house.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Yet if caught, he must pay sevenfold; he must give up all the wealth of his house.

contentJson: [{"text":"He who commits adultery lacks judgment;","poem":1},{"text":"whoever does so destroys himself.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: He who commits adultery lacks judgment; whoever does so destroys himself.

contentJson: [{"text":"Wounds and dishonor will befall him,","poem":1},{"text":"and his reproach will never be wiped away.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Wounds and dishonor will befall him, and his reproach will never be wiped away.

contentJson: [{"text":"For jealousy enrages a husband,","poem":1},{"text":"and he will show no mercy in the day of vengeance.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: For jealousy enrages a husband, and he will show no mercy in the day of vengeance.

contentJson: [{"text":"He will not be appeased by any ransom,","poem":1},{"text":"or persuaded by lavish gifts.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: He will not be appeased by any ransom, or persuaded by lavish gifts.

contentJson: [{"text":"My son, keep my words","poem":1},{"text":"and treasure my commandments within you.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: My son, keep my words and treasure my commandments within you.

contentJson: [{"text":"Keep my commandments and live;","poem":1},{"text":"guard my teachings as the apple","poem":2},{"noteId":26},{"text":"of your eye.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Keep my commandments and live; guard my teachings as the apple of your eye.

contentJson: [{"text":"Tie them to your fingers;","poem":1},{"text":"write them on the tablet of your heart.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Tie them to your fingers; write them on the tablet of your heart.

contentJson: [{"text":"Say to wisdom, “You are my sister,”","poem":1},{"text":"and call understanding your kinsman,","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Say to wisdom, “You are my sister,” and call understanding your kinsman,

contentJson: [{"text":"that they may keep you from the adulteress,","poem":1},{"text":"from the stranger with seductive words.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: that they may keep you from the adulteress, from the stranger with seductive words.

contentJson: [{"text":"For at the window of my house","poem":1},{"text":"I looked through the lattice.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: For at the window of my house I looked through the lattice.

contentJson: [{"text":"I saw among the simple,","poem":1},{"text":"I noticed among the youths,","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"a young man lacking judgment,","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
I saw among the simple, I noticed among the youths, 
a young man lacking judgment,

contentJson: [{"text":"crossing the street near her corner,","poem":1},{"text":"strolling down the road to her house,","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: crossing the street near her corner, strolling down the road to her house,

contentJson: [{"text":"at twilight, as the day was fading","poem":1},{"text":"into the dark of the night.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: at twilight, as the day was fading into the dark of the night.

contentJson: [{"text":"Then a woman came out to meet him,","poem":1},{"text":"with the attire of a harlot and cunning of heart.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Then a woman came out to meet him, with the attire of a harlot and cunning of heart.

contentJson: [{"text":"She is loud and defiant;","poem":1},{"text":"her feet do not remain at home.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: She is loud and defiant; her feet do not remain at home.

contentJson: [{"text":"Now in the street, now in the squares,","poem":1},{"text":"she lurks at every corner.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Now in the street, now in the squares, she lurks at every corner.

contentJson: [{"text":"She seizes him and kisses him;","poem":1},{"text":"she brazenly says to him:","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: She seizes him and kisses him; she brazenly says to him:

contentJson: [{"text":"“I have made my peace offerings;","poem":1},{"text":"today I have paid my vows.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: “I have made my peace offerings; today I have paid my vows.

contentJson: [{"text":"So I came out to meet you;","poem":1},{"text":"I sought you, and I have found you.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: So I came out to meet you; I sought you, and I have found you.

contentJson: [{"text":"I have decked my bed with coverings,","poem":1},{"text":"with colored linen from Egypt.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: I have decked my bed with coverings, with colored linen from Egypt.

contentJson: [{"text":"I have perfumed my bed with myrrh,","poem":1},{"text":"with aloes, and with cinnamon.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: I have perfumed my bed with myrrh, with aloes, and with cinnamon.

contentJson: [{"text":"Come, let us take our fill of love till morning.","poem":1},{"text":"Let us delight in loving caresses!","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Come, let us take our fill of love till morning. Let us delight in loving caresses!

contentJson: [{"text":"For my husband is not at home;","poem":1},{"text":"he has gone on a long journey.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: For my husband is not at home; he has gone on a long journey.

contentJson: [{"text":"He took with him a bag of money","poem":1},{"text":"and will not return till the moon is full.”","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: He took with him a bag of money and will not return till the moon is full.”

contentJson: [{"text":"With her great persuasion she entices him;","poem":1},{"text":"with her flattering lips she lures him.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: With her great persuasion she entices him; with her flattering lips she lures him.

contentJson: [{"text":"He follows her on impulse,","poem":1},{"text":"like an ox going to the slaughter,","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"like a deer bounding into a trap,","poem":2},{"noteId":27}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
He follows her on impulse, like an ox going to the slaughter, 
like a deer bounding into a trap,

contentJson: [{"text":"until an arrow pierces his liver,","poem":1},{"text":"like a bird darting into a snare—","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"not knowing it will cost him his life.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
until an arrow pierces his liver, like a bird darting into a snare— 
not knowing it will cost him his life.

contentJson: [{"text":"Now, my sons, listen to me,","poem":1},{"text":"and attend to the words of my mouth.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Now, my sons, listen to me, and attend to the words of my mouth.

contentJson: [{"text":"Do not let your heart turn aside to her ways;","poem":1},{"text":"do not stray into her paths.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Do not let your heart turn aside to her ways; do not stray into her paths.

contentJson: [{"text":"For she has brought many down to death;","poem":1},{"text":"her slain are many in number.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: For she has brought many down to death; her slain are many in number.

contentJson: [{"text":"Her house is the road to Sheol,","poem":1},{"text":"descending to the chambers of death.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Her house is the road to Sheol, descending to the chambers of death.

contentJson: [{"text":"Does not wisdom call out,","poem":1},{"text":"and understanding raise her voice?","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Does not wisdom call out, and understanding raise her voice?

contentJson: [{"text":"On the heights overlooking the road,","poem":1},{"text":"at the crossroads she takes her stand.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: On the heights overlooking the road, at the crossroads she takes her stand.

contentJson: [{"text":"Beside the gates to the city,","poem":1},{"text":"at the entrances she cries out:","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Beside the gates to the city, at the entrances she cries out:

contentJson: [{"text":"“To you, O men, I call out,","poem":1},{"text":"and my cry is to the sons of men.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: “To you, O men, I call out, and my cry is to the sons of men.

contentJson: [{"text":"O simple ones, learn to be shrewd;","poem":1},{"text":"O fools, gain understanding.","poem":2},{"noteId":28}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: O simple ones, learn to be shrewd; O fools, gain understanding.

contentJson: [{"text":"Listen, for I speak of noble things,","poem":1},{"text":"and the opening of my lips will reveal right.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Listen, for I speak of noble things, and the opening of my lips will reveal right.

contentJson: [{"text":"For my mouth will speak the truth,","poem":1},{"text":"and wickedness is detestable to my lips.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: For my mouth will speak the truth, and wickedness is detestable to my lips.

contentJson: [{"text":"All the words of my mouth are righteous;","poem":1},{"text":"none are crooked or perverse.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: All the words of my mouth are righteous; none are crooked or perverse.

contentJson: [{"text":"They are all plain to the discerning,","poem":1},{"text":"and upright to those who find knowledge.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: They are all plain to the discerning, and upright to those who find knowledge.

contentJson: [{"text":"Receive my instruction instead of silver,","poem":1},{"text":"and knowledge rather than pure gold.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Receive my instruction instead of silver, and knowledge rather than pure gold.

contentJson: [{"text":"For wisdom is more precious than rubies,","poem":1},{"text":"and nothing you desire compares with her.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: For wisdom is more precious than rubies, and nothing you desire compares with her.

contentJson: [{"text":"I, wisdom, dwell together with prudence,","poem":1},{"text":"and I find knowledge and discretion.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: I, wisdom, dwell together with prudence, and I find knowledge and discretion.

contentJson: [{"text":"To fear the LORD is to hate evil;","poem":1},{"text":"I hate arrogant pride, evil conduct, and perverse speech.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: To fear the LORD is to hate evil; I hate arrogant pride, evil conduct, and perverse speech.

contentJson: [{"text":"Counsel and sound judgment are mine;","poem":1},{"text":"I have insight and strength.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Counsel and sound judgment are mine; I have insight and strength.

contentJson: [{"text":"By me kings reign,","poem":1},{"text":"and rulers enact just laws;","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: By me kings reign, and rulers enact just laws;

contentJson: [{"text":"By me princes rule,","poem":1},{"text":"and all nobles who govern justly.","poem":2},{"noteId":29}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: By me princes rule, and all nobles who govern justly.

contentJson: [{"text":"I love those who love me,","poem":1},{"text":"and those who seek me early shall find me.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: I love those who love me, and those who seek me early shall find me.

contentJson: [{"text":"With me are riches and honor,","poem":1},{"text":"enduring wealth and righteousness.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: With me are riches and honor, enduring wealth and righteousness.

contentJson: [{"text":"My fruit is better than gold, pure gold,","poem":1},{"text":"and my harvest surpasses choice silver.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: My fruit is better than gold, pure gold, and my harvest surpasses choice silver.

contentJson: [{"text":"I walk in the way of righteousness,","poem":1},{"text":"along the paths of justice,","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: I walk in the way of righteousness, along the paths of justice,

contentJson: [{"text":"bestowing wealth on those who love me","poem":1},{"text":"and making their treasuries full.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: bestowing wealth on those who love me and making their treasuries full.

contentJson: [{"text":"The LORD created me as His first course,","poem":1},{"noteId":30},{"text":"before His works of old.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The LORD created me as His first course, before His works of old.

contentJson: [{"text":"From everlasting I was established,","poem":1},{"text":"from the beginning, before the earth began.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: From everlasting I was established, from the beginning, before the earth began.

contentJson: [{"text":"When there were no watery depths, I was brought forth,","poem":1},{"text":"when no springs were overflowing with water.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: When there were no watery depths, I was brought forth, when no springs were overflowing with water.

contentJson: [{"text":"Before the mountains were settled,","poem":1},{"text":"before the hills, I was brought forth,","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Before the mountains were settled, before the hills, I was brought forth,

contentJson: [{"text":"before He made the land or fields,","poem":1},{"text":"or any of the dust of the earth.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: before He made the land or fields, or any of the dust of the earth.

contentJson: [{"text":"I was there when He established the heavens,","poem":1},{"text":"when He inscribed a circle on the face of the deep,","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: I was there when He established the heavens, when He inscribed a circle on the face of the deep,

contentJson: [{"text":"when He established the clouds above,","poem":1},{"text":"when the fountains of the deep gushed forth,","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: when He established the clouds above, when the fountains of the deep gushed forth,

contentJson: [{"text":"when He set a boundary for the sea,","poem":1},{"text":"so that the waters would not surpass His command,","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"when He marked out the foundations of the earth.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
when He set a boundary for the sea, so that the waters would not surpass His command, 
when He marked out the foundations of the earth.

contentJson: [{"text":"Then I was a skilled craftsman at His side,","poem":1},{"text":"and His delight","poem":2},{"noteId":31},{"text":"day by day,","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"rejoicing always in His presence.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
Then I was a skilled craftsman at His side, and His delight day by day, 
rejoicing always in His presence.

contentJson: [{"text":"I was rejoicing in His whole world,","poem":1},{"text":"delighting together in the sons of men.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: I was rejoicing in His whole world, delighting together in the sons of men.

contentJson: [{"text":"Now therefore, my sons, listen to me,","poem":1},{"text":"for blessed are those who keep my ways.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Now therefore, my sons, listen to me, for blessed are those who keep my ways.

contentJson: [{"text":"Listen to instruction and be wise;","poem":1},{"text":"do not ignore it.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Listen to instruction and be wise; do not ignore it.

contentJson: [{"text":"Blessed is the man who listens to me,","poem":1},{"text":"watching daily at my doors,","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"waiting at the posts of my doorway.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
Blessed is the man who listens to me, watching daily at my doors, 
waiting at the posts of my doorway.

contentJson: [{"text":"For whoever finds me finds life","poem":1},{"text":"and obtains the favor of the LORD.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: For whoever finds me finds life and obtains the favor of the LORD.

contentJson: [{"text":"But he who fails to find me harms himself;","poem":1},{"text":"all who hate me love death.”","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: But he who fails to find me harms himself; all who hate me love death.”

contentJson: [{"text":"Wisdom has built her house;","poem":1},{"text":"she has carved out","poem":2},{"noteId":32},{"text":"her seven pillars.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Wisdom has built her house; she has carved out her seven pillars.

contentJson: [{"text":"She has prepared her meat and mixed her wine;","poem":1},{"text":"she has also set her table.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: She has prepared her meat and mixed her wine; she has also set her table.

contentJson: [{"text":"She has sent out her maidservants;","poem":1},{"text":"she calls out from the heights of the city.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: She has sent out her maidservants; she calls out from the heights of the city.

contentJson: [{"text":"“Whoever is simple, let him turn in here!”","poem":1},{"text":"she says to him who lacks judgment.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: “Whoever is simple, let him turn in here!” she says to him who lacks judgment.

contentJson: [{"text":"“Come, eat my bread","poem":1},{"text":"and drink the wine I have mixed.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: “Come, eat my bread and drink the wine I have mixed.

contentJson: [{"text":"Leave your folly behind, and you will live;","poem":1},{"text":"walk in the way of understanding.”","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Leave your folly behind, and you will live; walk in the way of understanding.”

contentJson: [{"text":"He who corrects a mocker brings shame on himself;","poem":1},{"text":"he who rebukes a wicked man taints himself.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: He who corrects a mocker brings shame on himself; he who rebukes a wicked man taints himself.

contentJson: [{"text":"Do not rebuke a mocker, or he will hate you;","poem":1},{"text":"rebuke a wise man, and he will love you.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Do not rebuke a mocker, or he will hate you; rebuke a wise man, and he will love you.

contentJson: [{"text":"Instruct a wise man, and he will be wiser still;","poem":1},{"text":"teach a righteous man, and he will increase his learning.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Instruct a wise man, and he will be wiser still; teach a righteous man, and he will increase his learning.

contentJson: [{"text":"The fear of the LORD is the beginning of wisdom,","poem":1},{"text":"and knowledge of the Holy One is understanding.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The fear of the LORD is the beginning of wisdom, and knowledge of the Holy One is understanding.

contentJson: [{"text":"For through wisdom","poem":1},{"noteId":33},{"text":"your days will be multiplied,","poem":1},{"text":"and years will be added to your life.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: For through wisdom your days will be multiplied, and years will be added to your life.

contentJson: [{"text":"If you are wise, you are wise to your own advantage;","poem":1},{"text":"but if you scoff, you alone will bear the consequences.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: If you are wise, you are wise to your own advantage; but if you scoff, you alone will bear the consequences.

contentJson: [{"text":"The woman named Folly is loud;","poem":1},{"text":"she is naive and knows nothing.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The woman named Folly is loud; she is naive and knows nothing.

contentJson: [{"text":"She sits at the door of her house,","poem":1},{"text":"on a seat in the heights of the city,","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: She sits at the door of her house, on a seat in the heights of the city,

contentJson: [{"text":"calling out to those who pass by,","poem":1},{"text":"who make their paths straight.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: calling out to those who pass by, who make their paths straight.

contentJson: [{"text":"“Whoever is simple, let him turn in here!”","poem":1},{"text":"she says to him who lacks judgment.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: “Whoever is simple, let him turn in here!” she says to him who lacks judgment.

contentJson: [{"text":"“Stolen water is sweet,","poem":1},{"text":"and bread eaten in secret is tasty!”","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: “Stolen water is sweet, and bread eaten in secret is tasty!”

contentJson: [{"text":"But they do not know that the dead","poem":1},{"noteId":34},{"text":"are there,","poem":1},{"text":"that her guests are in the depths of Sheol.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: But they do not know that the dead are there, that her guests are in the depths of Sheol.

contentJson: ["The proverbs of Solomon:",{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"A wise son brings joy to his father,","poem":1},{"text":"but a foolish son grief to his mother.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
The proverbs of Solomon: 
A wise son brings joy to his father, but a foolish son grief to his mother.

contentJson: [{"text":"Ill-gotten treasures profit nothing,","poem":1},{"text":"but righteousness brings deliverance from death.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Ill-gotten treasures profit nothing, but righteousness brings deliverance from death.

contentJson: [{"text":"The LORD does not let the righteous go hungry,","poem":1},{"text":"but He denies the craving of the wicked.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The LORD does not let the righteous go hungry, but He denies the craving of the wicked.

contentJson: [{"text":"Idle hands make one poor,","poem":1},{"text":"but diligent hands bring wealth.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Idle hands make one poor, but diligent hands bring wealth.

contentJson: [{"text":"He who gathers in summer is a wise son,","poem":1},{"text":"but he who sleeps during harvest is a disgraceful son.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: He who gathers in summer is a wise son, but he who sleeps during harvest is a disgraceful son.

contentJson: [{"text":"Blessings are on the head of the righteous,","poem":1},{"text":"but the mouth of the wicked conceals violence.","poem":2},{"noteId":35}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Blessings are on the head of the righteous, but the mouth of the wicked conceals violence.

contentJson: [{"text":"The memory of the righteous is a blessing,","poem":1},{"text":"but the name of the wicked will rot.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The memory of the righteous is a blessing, but the name of the wicked will rot.

contentJson: [{"text":"A wise heart will receive commandments,","poem":1},{"text":"but foolish lips will come to ruin.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: A wise heart will receive commandments, but foolish lips will come to ruin.

contentJson: [{"text":"He who walks in integrity walks securely,","poem":1},{"text":"but he who perverts his ways will be found out.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: He who walks in integrity walks securely, but he who perverts his ways will be found out.

contentJson: [{"text":"He who winks the eye causes grief,","poem":1},{"text":"and foolish lips will come to ruin.","poem":2},{"noteId":36}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: He who winks the eye causes grief, and foolish lips will come to ruin.

contentJson: [{"text":"The mouth of the righteous is a fountain of life,","poem":1},{"text":"but the mouth of the wicked conceals violence.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The mouth of the righteous is a fountain of life, but the mouth of the wicked conceals violence.

contentJson: [{"text":"Hatred stirs up dissension,","poem":1},{"text":"but love covers all transgressions.","poem":2},{"noteId":37}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Hatred stirs up dissension, but love covers all transgressions.

contentJson: [{"text":"Wisdom is found on the lips of the discerning,","poem":1},{"text":"but a rod is for the back of him who lacks judgment.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Wisdom is found on the lips of the discerning, but a rod is for the back of him who lacks judgment.

contentJson: [{"text":"The wise store up knowledge,","poem":1},{"text":"but the mouth of the fool invites destruction.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The wise store up knowledge, but the mouth of the fool invites destruction.

contentJson: [{"text":"The wealth of the rich man is his fortified city,","poem":1},{"text":"but poverty is the ruin of the poor.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The wealth of the rich man is his fortified city, but poverty is the ruin of the poor.

contentJson: [{"text":"The labor of the righteous leads to life,","poem":1},{"text":"but the gain of the wicked brings punishment.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The labor of the righteous leads to life, but the gain of the wicked brings punishment.

contentJson: [{"text":"Whoever heeds instruction is on the path to life,","poem":1},{"text":"but he who ignores reproof goes astray.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Whoever heeds instruction is on the path to life, but he who ignores reproof goes astray.

contentJson: [{"text":"The one who conceals hatred has lying lips,","poem":1},{"text":"and whoever spreads slander is a fool.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The one who conceals hatred has lying lips, and whoever spreads slander is a fool.

contentJson: [{"text":"When words are many, sin is unavoidable,","poem":1},{"text":"but he who restrains his lips is wise.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: When words are many, sin is unavoidable, but he who restrains his lips is wise.

contentJson: [{"text":"The tongue of the righteous is choice silver,","poem":1},{"text":"but the heart of the wicked has little worth.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The tongue of the righteous is choice silver, but the heart of the wicked has little worth.

contentJson: [{"text":"The lips of the righteous feed many,","poem":1},{"text":"but fools die for lack of judgment.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The lips of the righteous feed many, but fools die for lack of judgment.

contentJson: [{"text":"The blessing of the LORD enriches,","poem":1},{"text":"and He adds no sorrow to it.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The blessing of the LORD enriches, and He adds no sorrow to it.

contentJson: [{"text":"The fool delights in shameful conduct,","poem":1},{"text":"but a man of understanding has wisdom.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The fool delights in shameful conduct, but a man of understanding has wisdom.

contentJson: [{"text":"What the wicked man dreads will overtake him,","poem":1},{"text":"but the desire of the righteous will be granted.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: What the wicked man dreads will overtake him, but the desire of the righteous will be granted.

contentJson: [{"text":"When the whirlwind passes, the wicked are no more,","poem":1},{"text":"but the righteous are secure forever.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: When the whirlwind passes, the wicked are no more, but the righteous are secure forever.

contentJson: [{"text":"Like vinegar to the teeth and smoke to the eyes,","poem":1},{"text":"so is the slacker to those who send him.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Like vinegar to the teeth and smoke to the eyes, so is the slacker to those who send him.

contentJson: [{"text":"The fear of the LORD prolongs life,","poem":1},{"text":"but the years of the wicked will be cut short.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The fear of the LORD prolongs life, but the years of the wicked will be cut short.

contentJson: [{"text":"The hope of the righteous is joy,","poem":1},{"text":"but the expectations of the wicked will perish.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The hope of the righteous is joy, but the expectations of the wicked will perish.

contentJson: [{"text":"The way of the LORD is a refuge to the upright,","poem":1},{"text":"but destruction awaits those who do evil.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The way of the LORD is a refuge to the upright, but destruction awaits those who do evil.

contentJson: [{"text":"The righteous will never be shaken,","poem":1},{"text":"but the wicked will not inhabit the land.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The righteous will never be shaken, but the wicked will not inhabit the land.

contentJson: [{"text":"The mouth of the righteous brings forth wisdom,","poem":1},{"text":"but a perverse tongue will be cut out.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The mouth of the righteous brings forth wisdom, but a perverse tongue will be cut out.

contentJson: [{"text":"The lips of the righteous know what is fitting,","poem":1},{"text":"but the mouth of the wicked is perverse.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The lips of the righteous know what is fitting, but the mouth of the wicked is perverse.

contentJson: [{"text":"Dishonest scales are an abomination to the LORD,","poem":1},{"text":"but an accurate weight is His delight.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Dishonest scales are an abomination to the LORD, but an accurate weight is His delight.

contentJson: [{"text":"When pride comes, disgrace follows,","poem":1},{"text":"but with humility comes wisdom.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: When pride comes, disgrace follows, but with humility comes wisdom.

contentJson: [{"text":"The integrity of the upright guides them,","poem":1},{"text":"but the perversity of the faithless destroys them.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The integrity of the upright guides them, but the perversity of the faithless destroys them.

contentJson: [{"text":"Riches are worthless in the day of wrath,","poem":1},{"text":"but righteousness brings deliverance from death.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Riches are worthless in the day of wrath, but righteousness brings deliverance from death.

contentJson: [{"text":"The righteousness of the blameless directs their path,","poem":1},{"text":"but the wicked fall by their own wickedness.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The righteousness of the blameless directs their path, but the wicked fall by their own wickedness.

contentJson: [{"text":"The righteousness of the upright delivers them,","poem":1},{"text":"but the faithless are trapped by their own desires.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The righteousness of the upright delivers them, but the faithless are trapped by their own desires.

contentJson: [{"text":"When the wicked man dies, his hope perishes,","poem":1},{"text":"and the hope of his strength vanishes.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: When the wicked man dies, his hope perishes, and the hope of his strength vanishes.

contentJson: [{"text":"The righteous man is delivered from trouble;","poem":1},{"text":"in his place the wicked man goes in.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The righteous man is delivered from trouble; in his place the wicked man goes in.

contentJson: [{"text":"With his mouth the ungodly man destroys his neighbor,","poem":1},{"text":"but through knowledge the righteous are rescued.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: With his mouth the ungodly man destroys his neighbor, but through knowledge the righteous are rescued.

contentJson: [{"text":"When the righteous thrive, the city rejoices,","poem":1},{"text":"and when the wicked perish, there are shouts of joy.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: When the righteous thrive, the city rejoices, and when the wicked perish, there are shouts of joy.

contentJson: [{"text":"By the blessing of the upright a city is built up,","poem":1},{"text":"but by the mouth of the wicked it is torn down.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: By the blessing of the upright a city is built up, but by the mouth of the wicked it is torn down.

contentJson: [{"text":"Whoever shows contempt for his neighbor lacks judgment,","poem":1},{"text":"but a man of understanding remains silent.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Whoever shows contempt for his neighbor lacks judgment, but a man of understanding remains silent.

contentJson: [{"text":"A gossip reveals a secret,","poem":1},{"text":"but a trustworthy person keeps a confidence.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: A gossip reveals a secret, but a trustworthy person keeps a confidence.

contentJson: [{"text":"For lack of guidance, a nation falls,","poem":1},{"text":"but with many counselors comes deliverance.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: For lack of guidance, a nation falls, but with many counselors comes deliverance.

contentJson: [{"text":"He who puts up security for a stranger will surely suffer,","poem":1},{"text":"but the one who hates indebtedness is secure.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: He who puts up security for a stranger will surely suffer, but the one who hates indebtedness is secure.

contentJson: [{"text":"A gracious woman attains honor,","poem":1},{"text":"but ruthless men gain only wealth.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: A gracious woman attains honor, but ruthless men gain only wealth.

contentJson: [{"text":"A kind man benefits himself,","poem":1},{"text":"but a cruel man brings trouble on himself.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: A kind man benefits himself, but a cruel man brings trouble on himself.

contentJson: [{"text":"The wicked man earns an empty wage,","poem":1},{"text":"but he who sows righteousness reaps a true reward.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The wicked man earns an empty wage, but he who sows righteousness reaps a true reward.

contentJson: [{"text":"Genuine righteousness leads to life,","poem":1},{"text":"but the pursuit of evil brings death.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Genuine righteousness leads to life, but the pursuit of evil brings death.

contentJson: [{"text":"The perverse in heart are an abomination to the LORD,","poem":1},{"text":"but the blameless in their walk are His delight.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The perverse in heart are an abomination to the LORD, but the blameless in their walk are His delight.

contentJson: [{"text":"Be assured that the wicked will not go unpunished,","poem":1},{"text":"but the offspring of the righteous will escape.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Be assured that the wicked will not go unpunished, but the offspring of the righteous will escape.

contentJson: [{"text":"Like a gold ring in a pig’s snout","poem":1},{"text":"is a beautiful woman who lacks discretion.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Like a gold ring in a pig’s snout is a beautiful woman who lacks discretion.

contentJson: [{"text":"The desire of the righteous leads only to good,","poem":1},{"text":"but the hope of the wicked brings wrath.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The desire of the righteous leads only to good, but the hope of the wicked brings wrath.

contentJson: [{"text":"One gives freely, yet gains even more;","poem":1},{"text":"another withholds what is right, only to become poor.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: One gives freely, yet gains even more; another withholds what is right, only to become poor.

contentJson: [{"text":"A generous soul will prosper,","poem":1},{"text":"and he who refreshes others will himself be refreshed.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: A generous soul will prosper, and he who refreshes others will himself be refreshed.

contentJson: [{"text":"The people will curse the hoarder of grain,","poem":1},{"text":"but blessing will crown the one who sells it.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The people will curse the hoarder of grain, but blessing will crown the one who sells it.

contentJson: [{"text":"He who searches out good finds favor,","poem":1},{"text":"but evil will come to him who seeks it.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: He who searches out good finds favor, but evil will come to him who seeks it.

contentJson: [{"text":"He who trusts in his riches will fall,","poem":1},{"text":"but the righteous will thrive like foliage.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: He who trusts in his riches will fall, but the righteous will thrive like foliage.

contentJson: [{"text":"He who brings trouble on his house will inherit the wind,","poem":1},{"text":"and the fool will be servant to the wise of heart.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: He who brings trouble on his house will inherit the wind, and the fool will be servant to the wise of heart.
