contentJson: [{"text":"The fruit of the righteous is a tree of life,","poem":1},{"text":"and he who wins souls is wise.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The fruit of the righteous is a tree of life, and he who wins souls is wise.

contentJson: [{"text":"If the righteous receive their due on earth,","poem":1},{"text":"how much more the ungodly and the sinner!","poem":2},{"noteId":38}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: If the righteous receive their due on earth, how much more the ungodly and the sinner!

contentJson: [{"text":"Whoever loves discipline loves knowledge,","poem":1},{"text":"but he who hates correction is stupid.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Whoever loves discipline loves knowledge, but he who hates correction is stupid.

contentJson: [{"text":"The good man obtains favor from the LORD,","poem":1},{"text":"but the LORD condemns a man who devises evil.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The good man obtains favor from the LORD, but the LORD condemns a man who devises evil.

contentJson: [{"text":"A man cannot be established through wickedness,","poem":1},{"text":"but the righteous cannot be uprooted.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: A man cannot be established through wickedness, but the righteous cannot be uprooted.

contentJson: [{"text":"A wife of noble character is her husband’s crown,","poem":1},{"text":"but she who causes shame is like decay in his bones.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: A wife of noble character is her husband’s crown, but she who causes shame is like decay in his bones.

contentJson: [{"text":"The plans of the righteous are just,","poem":1},{"text":"but the counsel of the wicked leads to deceit.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The plans of the righteous are just, but the counsel of the wicked leads to deceit.

contentJson: [{"text":"The words of the wicked lie in wait for blood,","poem":1},{"text":"but the speech of the upright rescues them.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The words of the wicked lie in wait for blood, but the speech of the upright rescues them.

contentJson: [{"text":"The wicked are overthrown and perish,","poem":1},{"text":"but the house of the righteous will stand.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The wicked are overthrown and perish, but the house of the righteous will stand.

contentJson: [{"text":"A man is praised according to his wisdom,","poem":1},{"text":"but a twisted mind is despised.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: A man is praised according to his wisdom, but a twisted mind is despised.

contentJson: [{"text":"Better to be lightly esteemed yet have a servant,","poem":1},{"text":"than to be self-important but lack food.","poem":2}]

contentJson: [{"text":"The light of the eyes cheers the heart,","poem":1},{"text":"and good news nourishes the bones.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The light of the eyes cheers the heart, and good news nourishes the bones.

contentJson: [{"text":"He who listens to life-giving reproof","poem":1},{"text":"will dwell among the wise.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: He who listens to life-giving reproof will dwell among the wise.

contentJson: [{"text":"He who ignores discipline despises himself,","poem":1},{"text":"but whoever heeds correction gains understanding.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: He who ignores discipline despises himself, but whoever heeds correction gains understanding.

contentJson: [{"text":"The fear of the LORD is the instruction of wisdom,","poem":1},{"text":"and humility comes before honor.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The fear of the LORD is the instruction of wisdom, and humility comes before honor.

contentJson: [{"text":"The plans of the heart belong to man,","poem":1},{"text":"but the reply of the tongue is from the LORD.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The plans of the heart belong to man, but the reply of the tongue is from the LORD.

contentJson: [{"text":"All a man’s ways are pure in his own eyes,","poem":1},{"text":"but his motives are weighed out by the LORD.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: All a man’s ways are pure in his own eyes, but his motives are weighed out by the LORD.

contentJson: [{"text":"Commit your works to the LORD","poem":1},{"text":"and your plans will be achieved.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Commit your works to the LORD and your plans will be achieved.

contentJson: [{"text":"The LORD has made everything for His purpose—","poem":1},{"text":"even the wicked for the day of disaster.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The LORD has made everything for His purpose— even the wicked for the day of disaster.

contentJson: [{"text":"Everyone who is proud in heart is detestable to the LORD;","poem":1},{"text":"be assured that he will not go unpunished.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Everyone who is proud in heart is detestable to the LORD; be assured that he will not go unpunished.

contentJson: [{"text":"By loving devotion and faithfulness iniquity is atoned for,","poem":1},{"text":"and by the fear of the LORD one turns aside from evil.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: By loving devotion and faithfulness iniquity is atoned for, and by the fear of the LORD one turns aside from evil.

contentJson: [{"text":"When a man’s ways please the LORD,","poem":1},{"text":"He makes even the man’s enemies live at peace with him.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: When a man’s ways please the LORD, He makes even the man’s enemies live at peace with him.

contentJson: [{"text":"Better a little with righteousness","poem":1},{"text":"than great gain with injustice.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Better a little with righteousness than great gain with injustice.

contentJson: [{"text":"A man’s heart plans his course,","poem":1},{"text":"but the LORD determines his steps.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: A man’s heart plans his course, but the LORD determines his steps.

contentJson: [{"text":"A divine verdict is on the lips of a king;","poem":1},{"text":"his mouth must not betray justice.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: A divine verdict is on the lips of a king; his mouth must not betray justice.

contentJson: [{"text":"Honest scales and balances are from the LORD;","poem":1},{"text":"all the weights in the bag are His concern.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Honest scales and balances are from the LORD; all the weights in the bag are His concern.

contentJson: [{"text":"Wicked behavior is detestable to kings,","poem":1},{"text":"for a throne is established through righteousness.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Wicked behavior is detestable to kings, for a throne is established through righteousness.

contentJson: [{"text":"Righteous lips are a king’s delight,","poem":1},{"text":"and he who speaks honestly is beloved.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Righteous lips are a king’s delight, and he who speaks honestly is beloved.

contentJson: [{"text":"The wrath of a king is a messenger of death,","poem":1},{"text":"but a wise man will pacify it.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The wrath of a king is a messenger of death, but a wise man will pacify it.

contentJson: [{"text":"When a king’s face brightens, there is life;","poem":1},{"text":"his favor is like a rain cloud in spring.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: When a king’s face brightens, there is life; his favor is like a rain cloud in spring.

contentJson: [{"text":"How much better to acquire wisdom than gold!","poem":1},{"text":"To gain understanding is more desirable than silver.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: How much better to acquire wisdom than gold! To gain understanding is more desirable than silver.

contentJson: [{"text":"The highway of the upright leads away from evil;","poem":1},{"text":"he who guards his way protects his life.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The highway of the upright leads away from evil; he who guards his way protects his life.

contentJson: [{"text":"Pride goes before destruction,","poem":1},{"text":"and a haughty spirit before a fall.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Pride goes before destruction, and a haughty spirit before a fall.

contentJson: [{"text":"It is better to be lowly in spirit among the humble","poem":1},{"text":"than to divide the spoil with the proud.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: It is better to be lowly in spirit among the humble than to divide the spoil with the proud.

contentJson: [{"text":"Whoever heeds instruction will find success,","poem":1},{"noteId":44},{"text":"and blessed is he who trusts in the LORD.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Whoever heeds instruction will find success, and blessed is he who trusts in the LORD.

contentJson: [{"text":"The wise in heart are called discerning,","poem":1},{"text":"and pleasant speech promotes instruction.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The wise in heart are called discerning, and pleasant speech promotes instruction.

contentJson: [{"text":"Understanding is a fountain of life to its possessor,","poem":1},{"text":"but the discipline of fools is folly.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Understanding is a fountain of life to its possessor, but the discipline of fools is folly.

contentJson: [{"text":"The heart of the wise man instructs his mouth","poem":1},{"text":"and adds persuasiveness to his lips.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The heart of the wise man instructs his mouth and adds persuasiveness to his lips.

contentJson: [{"text":"Pleasant words are a honeycomb,","poem":1},{"text":"sweet to the soul and healing to the bones.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Pleasant words are a honeycomb, sweet to the soul and healing to the bones.

contentJson: [{"text":"There is a way that seems right to a man,","poem":1},{"text":"but its end is the way of death.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: There is a way that seems right to a man, but its end is the way of death.

contentJson: [{"text":"A worker’s appetite works for him","poem":1},{"text":"because his hunger drives him onward.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: A worker’s appetite works for him because his hunger drives him onward.

contentJson: [{"text":"A worthless man digs up evil,","poem":1},{"text":"and his speech","poem":2},{"noteId":45},{"text":"is like a scorching fire.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: A worthless man digs up evil, and his speech is like a scorching fire.

contentJson: [{"text":"A perverse man spreads dissension,","poem":1},{"text":"and a gossip divides close friends.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: A perverse man spreads dissension, and a gossip divides close friends.

contentJson: [{"text":"A violent man entices his neighbor","poem":1},{"text":"and leads him down a path that is not good.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: A violent man entices his neighbor and leads him down a path that is not good.

contentJson: [{"text":"He who winks his eye devises perversity;","poem":1},{"text":"he who purses his lips is bent on evil.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: He who winks his eye devises perversity; he who purses his lips is bent on evil.

contentJson: [{"text":"Gray hair is a crown of glory;","poem":1},{"text":"it is attained along the path of righteousness.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Gray hair is a crown of glory; it is attained along the path of righteousness.

contentJson: [{"text":"He who is slow to anger is better than a warrior,","poem":1},{"text":"and he who controls his temper is greater than one who captures a city.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: He who is slow to anger is better than a warrior, and he who controls his temper is greater than one who captures a city.

contentJson: [{"text":"The lot is cast into the lap,","poem":1},{"text":"but its every decision is from the LORD.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The lot is cast into the lap, but its every decision is from the LORD.

contentJson: [{"text":"Better a dry morsel in quietness","poem":1},{"text":"than a house full of feasting","poem":2},{"noteId":46},{"text":"with strife.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Better a dry morsel in quietness than a house full of feasting with strife.

contentJson: [{"text":"A wise servant will rule over a disgraceful son","poem":1},{"text":"and share his inheritance as one of the brothers.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: A wise servant will rule over a disgraceful son and share his inheritance as one of the brothers.

contentJson: [{"text":"A crucible for silver and a furnace for gold,","poem":1},{"text":"but the LORD is the tester of hearts.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: A crucible for silver and a furnace for gold, but the LORD is the tester of hearts.

contentJson: [{"text":"A wicked man listens to evil lips;","poem":1},{"text":"a liar gives ear to a destructive tongue.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: A wicked man listens to evil lips; a liar gives ear to a destructive tongue.

contentJson: [{"text":"He who mocks the poor insults their Maker;","poem":1},{"text":"whoever gloats over calamity will not go unpunished.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: He who mocks the poor insults their Maker; whoever gloats over calamity will not go unpunished.

contentJson: [{"text":"Grandchildren are the crown of the aged,","poem":1},{"text":"and the glory of a son is his father.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Grandchildren are the crown of the aged, and the glory of a son is his father.

contentJson: [{"text":"Eloquent words are unfit for a fool;","poem":1},{"text":"how much worse are lying lips to a ruler!","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Eloquent words are unfit for a fool; how much worse are lying lips to a ruler!

contentJson: [{"text":"A bribe is a charm to its giver;","poem":1},{"text":"wherever he turns, he succeeds.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: A bribe is a charm to its giver; wherever he turns, he succeeds.

contentJson: [{"text":"Whoever conceals an offense promotes love,","poem":1},{"text":"but he who brings it up separates friends.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Whoever conceals an offense promotes love, but he who brings it up separates friends.

contentJson: [{"text":"A rebuke cuts into a man of discernment","poem":1},{"text":"deeper than a hundred lashes cut into a fool.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: A rebuke cuts into a man of discernment deeper than a hundred lashes cut into a fool.

contentJson: [{"text":"An evil man seeks only rebellion;","poem":1},{"text":"a cruel messenger will be sent against him.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: An evil man seeks only rebellion; a cruel messenger will be sent against him.

contentJson: [{"text":"It is better to meet a bear robbed of her cubs","poem":1},{"text":"than a fool in his folly.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: It is better to meet a bear robbed of her cubs than a fool in his folly.

contentJson: [{"text":"If anyone returns evil for good,","poem":1},{"text":"evil will never leave his house.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: If anyone returns evil for good, evil will never leave his house.

contentJson: [{"text":"To start a quarrel is to release a flood;","poem":1},{"text":"so abandon the dispute before it breaks out.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: To start a quarrel is to release a flood; so abandon the dispute before it breaks out.

contentJson: [{"text":"Acquitting the guilty and condemning the righteous—","poem":1},{"text":"both are detestable to the LORD.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Acquitting the guilty and condemning the righteous— both are detestable to the LORD.

contentJson: [{"text":"Why should the fool have money in his hand","poem":1},{"text":"with no intention of buying wisdom?","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Why should the fool have money in his hand with no intention of buying wisdom?

contentJson: [{"text":"A friend loves at all times,","poem":1},{"text":"and a brother is born for adversity.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: A friend loves at all times, and a brother is born for adversity.

contentJson: [{"text":"A man lacking judgment strikes hands in pledge","poem":1},{"text":"and puts up security for his neighbor.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: A man lacking judgment strikes hands in pledge and puts up security for his neighbor.

contentJson: [{"text":"He who loves transgression loves strife;","poem":1},{"text":"he who builds his gate high invites destruction.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: He who loves transgression loves strife; he who builds his gate high invites destruction.

contentJson: [{"text":"The one with a perverse heart finds no good,","poem":1},{"text":"and he whose tongue is deceitful falls into trouble.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The one with a perverse heart finds no good, and he whose tongue is deceitful falls into trouble.

contentJson: [{"text":"A man fathers a fool to his own grief;","poem":1},{"text":"the father of a fool has no joy.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: A man fathers a fool to his own grief; the father of a fool has no joy.

contentJson: [{"text":"A joyful heart is good medicine,","poem":1},{"text":"but a broken spirit dries up the bones.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: A joyful heart is good medicine, but a broken spirit dries up the bones.

contentJson: [{"text":"A wicked man takes a covert bribe","poem":1},{"noteId":47},{"text":"to subvert the course of justice.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: A wicked man takes a covert bribe to subvert the course of justice.

contentJson: [{"text":"Wisdom is the focus of the discerning,","poem":1},{"text":"but the eyes of a fool wander to the ends of the earth.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Wisdom is the focus of the discerning, but the eyes of a fool wander to the ends of the earth.

contentJson: [{"text":"A foolish son brings grief to his father","poem":1},{"text":"and bitterness to her who bore him.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: A foolish son brings grief to his father and bitterness to her who bore him.

contentJson: [{"text":"It is surely not good to punish the innocent","poem":1},{"text":"or to flog a noble for his honesty.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: It is surely not good to punish the innocent or to flog a noble for his honesty.

contentJson: [{"text":"A man of knowledge restrains his words,","poem":1},{"text":"and a man of understanding maintains a calm spirit.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: A man of knowledge restrains his words, and a man of understanding maintains a calm spirit.

contentJson: [{"text":"Even a fool is considered wise if he keeps silent,","poem":1},{"text":"and discerning when he holds his tongue.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Even a fool is considered wise if he keeps silent, and discerning when he holds his tongue.

contentJson: [{"text":"He who isolates himself pursues selfish desires;","poem":1},{"text":"he rebels against all sound judgment.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: He who isolates himself pursues selfish desires; he rebels against all sound judgment.

contentJson: [{"text":"A fool does not delight in understanding,","poem":1},{"text":"but only in airing his opinions.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: A fool does not delight in understanding, but only in airing his opinions.

contentJson: [{"text":"With a wicked man comes contempt as well,","poem":1},{"text":"and shame is accompanied by disgrace.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: With a wicked man comes contempt as well, and shame is accompanied by disgrace.

contentJson: [{"text":"The words of a man’s mouth are deep waters;","poem":1},{"text":"the fountain of wisdom is a bubbling brook.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The words of a man’s mouth are deep waters; the fountain of wisdom is a bubbling brook.

contentJson: [{"text":"Showing partiality","poem":1},{"noteId":48},{"text":"to the wicked is not good,","poem":1},{"text":"nor is depriving the innocent of justice.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Showing partiality to the wicked is not good, nor is depriving the innocent of justice.

contentJson: [{"text":"A fool’s lips bring him strife,","poem":1},{"text":"and his mouth invites a beating.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: A fool’s lips bring him strife, and his mouth invites a beating.

contentJson: [{"text":"A fool’s mouth is his ruin,","poem":1},{"text":"and his lips are a snare to his soul.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: A fool’s mouth is his ruin, and his lips are a snare to his soul.

contentJson: [{"text":"The words of a gossip are like choice morsels","poem":1},{"text":"that go down into the inmost being.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The words of a gossip are like choice morsels that go down into the inmost being.

contentJson: [{"text":"Whoever is slothful in his work","poem":1},{"text":"is brother to him who destroys.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Whoever is slothful in his work is brother to him who destroys.

contentJson: [{"text":"The name of the LORD is a strong tower;","poem":1},{"text":"the righteous run to it","poem":2},{"noteId":49},{"text":"and are safe.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The name of the LORD is a strong tower; the righteous run to it and are safe.

contentJson: [{"text":"A rich man’s wealth is his fortified city;","poem":1},{"text":"it is like a high wall in his imagination.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: A rich man’s wealth is his fortified city; it is like a high wall in his imagination.

contentJson: [{"text":"Before his downfall a man’s heart is proud,","poem":1},{"text":"but humility comes before honor.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Before his downfall a man’s heart is proud, but humility comes before honor.

contentJson: [{"text":"He who answers a matter before he hears it—","poem":1},{"text":"this is folly and disgrace to him.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: He who answers a matter before he hears it— this is folly and disgrace to him.

contentJson: [{"text":"The spirit of a man can endure his sickness,","poem":1},{"text":"but who can survive a broken spirit?","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The spirit of a man can endure his sickness, but who can survive a broken spirit?

contentJson: [{"text":"The heart of the discerning acquires knowledge,","poem":1},{"text":"and the ear of the wise seeks it out.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The heart of the discerning acquires knowledge, and the ear of the wise seeks it out.

contentJson: [{"text":"A man’s gift opens doors for him,","poem":1},{"text":"and brings him before great men.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: A man’s gift opens doors for him, and brings him before great men.

contentJson: [{"text":"The first to state his case seems right","poem":1},{"text":"until another comes and cross-examines him.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The first to state his case seems right until another comes and cross-examines him.

contentJson: [{"text":"Casting the lot ends quarrels","poem":1},{"text":"and separates strong opponents.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Casting the lot ends quarrels and separates strong opponents.

contentJson: [{"text":"An offended brother is harder to win than a fortified city,","poem":1},{"text":"and disputes are like the bars of a castle.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: An offended brother is harder to win than a fortified city, and disputes are like the bars of a castle.

contentJson: [{"text":"From the fruit of his mouth a man’s belly is filled;","poem":1},{"text":"with the harvest from his lips he is satisfied.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: From the fruit of his mouth a man’s belly is filled; with the harvest from his lips he is satisfied.

contentJson: [{"text":"Life and death are in the power of the tongue,","poem":1},{"text":"and those who love it will eat its fruit.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Life and death are in the power of the tongue, and those who love it will eat its fruit.

contentJson: [{"text":"He who finds a wife finds a good thing","poem":1},{"text":"and obtains favor from the LORD.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: He who finds a wife finds a good thing and obtains favor from the LORD.

contentJson: [{"text":"The poor man pleads for mercy,","poem":1},{"text":"but the rich man answers harshly.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The poor man pleads for mercy, but the rich man answers harshly.

contentJson: [{"text":"A man of many companions may come to ruin,","poem":1},{"text":"but there is a friend who stays closer than a brother.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: A man of many companions may come to ruin, but there is a friend who stays closer than a brother.

contentJson: [{"text":"Better a poor man who walks with integrity","poem":1},{"text":"than a fool whose lips are perverse.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Better a poor man who walks with integrity than a fool whose lips are perverse.

contentJson: [{"text":"Even zeal is no good without knowledge,","poem":1},{"text":"and he who hurries his footsteps misses the mark.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Even zeal is no good without knowledge, and he who hurries his footsteps misses the mark.

contentJson: [{"text":"A man’s own folly subverts his way,","poem":1},{"text":"yet his heart rages against the LORD.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: A man’s own folly subverts his way, yet his heart rages against the LORD.

contentJson: [{"text":"Wealth attracts many friends,","poem":1},{"text":"but a poor man is deserted by his friend.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Wealth attracts many friends, but a poor man is deserted by his friend.

contentJson: [{"text":"A false witness will not go unpunished,","poem":1},{"text":"and one who utters lies will not escape.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: A false witness will not go unpunished, and one who utters lies will not escape.

contentJson: [{"text":"Many seek the favor of the prince,","poem":1},{"text":"and everyone is a friend of the gift giver.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Many seek the favor of the prince, and everyone is a friend of the gift giver.

contentJson: [{"text":"All the brothers of a poor man hate him—","poem":1},{"text":"how much more do his friends avoid him!","poem":2},{"text":"He may pursue them with pleading,","poem":1},{"text":"but they are nowhere to be found.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: All the brothers of a poor man hate him— how much more do his friends avoid him! He may pursue them with pleading, but they are nowhere to be found.

contentJson: [{"text":"He who acquires wisdom loves himself;","poem":1},{"text":"one who safeguards understanding will find success.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: He who acquires wisdom loves himself; one who safeguards understanding will find success.

contentJson: [{"text":"A false witness will not go unpunished,","poem":1},{"text":"and one who pours out lies will perish.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: A false witness will not go unpunished, and one who pours out lies will perish.

contentJson: [{"text":"Luxury is unseemly for a fool—","poem":1},{"text":"how much worse for a slave to rule over princes!","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Luxury is unseemly for a fool— how much worse for a slave to rule over princes!

contentJson: [{"text":"A man’s insight gives him patience,","poem":1},{"text":"and his virtue is to overlook an offense.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: A man’s insight gives him patience, and his virtue is to overlook an offense.

contentJson: [{"text":"A king’s rage is like the roar of a lion,","poem":1},{"text":"but his favor is like dew on the grass.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: A king’s rage is like the roar of a lion, but his favor is like dew on the grass.

contentJson: [{"text":"A foolish son is his father’s ruin,","poem":1},{"text":"and a quarrelsome wife is like a constant dripping.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: A foolish son is his father’s ruin, and a quarrelsome wife is like a constant dripping.

contentJson: [{"text":"Houses and wealth are inherited from fathers,","poem":1},{"text":"but a prudent wife is from the LORD.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Houses and wealth are inherited from fathers, but a prudent wife is from the LORD.

contentJson: [{"text":"Laziness brings on deep sleep,","poem":1},{"text":"and an idle soul will suffer hunger.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Laziness brings on deep sleep, and an idle soul will suffer hunger.

contentJson: [{"text":"He who keeps a commandment preserves his soul,","poem":1},{"text":"but he who is careless in his ways will die.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: He who keeps a commandment preserves his soul, but he who is careless in his ways will die.

contentJson: [{"text":"Kindness to the poor is a loan to the LORD,","poem":1},{"text":"and He will repay the lender.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Kindness to the poor is a loan to the LORD, and He will repay the lender.

contentJson: [{"text":"Discipline your son, for in that there is hope;","poem":1},{"text":"do not be party to his death.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Discipline your son, for in that there is hope; do not be party to his death.

contentJson: [{"text":"A man of great anger must pay the penalty;","poem":1},{"text":"if you rescue him, you will have to do so again.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: A man of great anger must pay the penalty; if you rescue him, you will have to do so again.

contentJson: [{"text":"Listen to counsel and accept discipline,","poem":1},{"text":"that you may be wise the rest of your days.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Listen to counsel and accept discipline, that you may be wise the rest of your days.

contentJson: [{"text":"Many plans are in a man’s heart,","poem":1},{"text":"but the purpose of the LORD will prevail.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Many plans are in a man’s heart, but the purpose of the LORD will prevail.

contentJson: [{"text":"The desire of a man is loving devotion;","poem":1},{"text":"better to be poor than a liar.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The desire of a man is loving devotion; better to be poor than a liar.

contentJson: [{"text":"The fear of the LORD leads to life,","poem":1},{"text":"that one may rest content, without visitation from harm.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The fear of the LORD leads to life, that one may rest content, without visitation from harm.

contentJson: [{"text":"The slacker buries his hand in the dish;","poem":1},{"text":"he will not even bring it back to his mouth.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The slacker buries his hand in the dish; he will not even bring it back to his mouth.

contentJson: [{"text":"Strike a mocker, and the simple will beware;","poem":1},{"text":"rebuke the discerning man, and he will gain knowledge.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Strike a mocker, and the simple will beware; rebuke the discerning man, and he will gain knowledge.

contentJson: [{"text":"He who assaults his father or evicts his mother","poem":1},{"text":"is a son who brings shame and disgrace.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: He who assaults his father or evicts his mother is a son who brings shame and disgrace.

contentJson: [{"text":"If you cease to hear instruction, my son,","poem":1},{"text":"you will stray from the words of knowledge.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: If you cease to hear instruction, my son, you will stray from the words of knowledge.

contentJson: [{"text":"A corrupt witness mocks justice,","poem":1},{"text":"and a wicked mouth swallows iniquity.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: A corrupt witness mocks justice, and a wicked mouth swallows iniquity.

contentJson: [{"text":"Judgments are prepared for mockers,","poem":1},{"text":"and beatings for the backs of fools.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Judgments are prepared for mockers, and beatings for the backs of fools.

contentJson: [{"text":"Wine is a mocker, strong drink is a brawler,","poem":1},{"text":"and whoever is led astray by them is not wise.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Wine is a mocker, strong drink is a brawler, and whoever is led astray by them is not wise.

contentJson: [{"text":"The terror of a king is like the roar of a lion;","poem":1},{"text":"whoever provokes him forfeits his own life.","poem":2},{"noteId":50}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The terror of a king is like the roar of a lion; whoever provokes him forfeits his own life.

contentJson: [{"text":"It is honorable for a man to resolve a dispute,","poem":1},{"text":"but any fool will quarrel.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: It is honorable for a man to resolve a dispute, but any fool will quarrel.

contentJson: [{"text":"The slacker does not plow in season;","poem":1},{"text":"at harvest time he looks, but nothing is there.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The slacker does not plow in season; at harvest time he looks, but nothing is there.

contentJson: [{"text":"The intentions of a man’s heart are deep waters,","poem":1},{"text":"but a man of understanding draws them out.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The intentions of a man’s heart are deep waters, but a man of understanding draws them out.

contentJson: [{"text":"Many a man proclaims his loving devotion,","poem":1},{"text":"but who can find a trustworthy man?","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Many a man proclaims his loving devotion, but who can find a trustworthy man?

contentJson: [{"text":"The righteous man walks with integrity;","poem":1},{"text":"blessed are his children after him.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The righteous man walks with integrity; blessed are his children after him.

contentJson: [{"text":"A king who sits on a throne to judge","poem":1},{"text":"sifts out all evil with his eyes.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: A king who sits on a throne to judge sifts out all evil with his eyes.

contentJson: [{"text":"Who can say, “I have kept my heart pure;","poem":1},{"text":"I am cleansed from my sin”?","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Who can say, “I have kept my heart pure; I am cleansed from my sin”?

contentJson: [{"text":"Differing weights and unequal measures","poem":1},{"noteId":51},{"text":"—","poem":1},{"text":"both are detestable to the LORD.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Differing weights and unequal measures — both are detestable to the LORD.

contentJson: [{"text":"Even a young man is known by his actions—","poem":1},{"text":"whether his conduct is pure and upright.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Even a young man is known by his actions— whether his conduct is pure and upright.

contentJson: [{"text":"Ears that hear and eyes that see—","poem":1},{"text":"the LORD has made them both.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Ears that hear and eyes that see— the LORD has made them both.

contentJson: [{"text":"Do not love sleep, or you will grow poor;","poem":1},{"text":"open your eyes, and you will have plenty of food.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Do not love sleep, or you will grow poor; open your eyes, and you will have plenty of food.

contentJson: [{"text":"“Worthless, worthless!” says the buyer,","poem":1},{"text":"but on the way out, he gloats.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: “Worthless, worthless!” says the buyer, but on the way out, he gloats.

contentJson: [{"text":"There is an abundance of gold and rubies,","poem":1},{"text":"but lips of knowledge are a rare treasure.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: There is an abundance of gold and rubies, but lips of knowledge are a rare treasure.

contentJson: [{"text":"Take the garment of the one who posts security for a stranger;","poem":1},{"text":"get collateral if it is for a foreigner.","poem":2},{"noteId":52}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Take the garment of the one who posts security for a stranger; get collateral if it is for a foreigner.

contentJson: [{"text":"Food gained by fraud is sweet to a man,","poem":1},{"text":"but later his mouth is full of gravel.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Food gained by fraud is sweet to a man, but later his mouth is full of gravel.

contentJson: [{"text":"Set plans by consultation,","poem":1},{"text":"and wage war under sound guidance.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Set plans by consultation, and wage war under sound guidance.

contentJson: [{"text":"He who reveals secrets is a constant gossip;","poem":1},{"text":"avoid the one who babbles","poem":2},{"noteId":53},{"text":"with his lips.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: He who reveals secrets is a constant gossip; avoid the one who babbles with his lips.

contentJson: [{"text":"Whoever curses his father or mother,","poem":1},{"text":"his lamp will be extinguished in deepest darkness.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Whoever curses his father or mother, his lamp will be extinguished in deepest darkness.

contentJson: [{"text":"An inheritance gained quickly","poem":1},{"text":"will not be blessed in the end.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: An inheritance gained quickly will not be blessed in the end.

contentJson: [{"text":"Do not say, “I will avenge this evil!”","poem":1},{"text":"Wait on the LORD, and He will save you.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Do not say, “I will avenge this evil!” Wait on the LORD, and He will save you.

contentJson: [{"text":"Unequal weights are detestable to the LORD,","poem":1},{"text":"and dishonest scales are no good.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Unequal weights are detestable to the LORD, and dishonest scales are no good.

contentJson: [{"text":"A man’s steps are from the LORD,","poem":1},{"text":"so how can anyone understand his own way?","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: A man’s steps are from the LORD, so how can anyone understand his own way?

contentJson: [{"text":"It is a trap for a man to dedicate something rashly,","poem":1},{"text":"only later to reconsider his vows.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: It is a trap for a man to dedicate something rashly, only later to reconsider his vows.

contentJson: [{"text":"A wise king separates out the wicked","poem":1},{"text":"and drives the threshing wheel over them.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: A wise king separates out the wicked and drives the threshing wheel over them.

contentJson: [{"text":"The spirit","poem":1},{"noteId":54},{"text":"of a man is the lamp of the LORD,","poem":1},{"text":"searching out his inmost being.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The spirit of a man is the lamp of the LORD, searching out his inmost being.

contentJson: [{"text":"Loving devotion and faithfulness preserve a king;","poem":1},{"text":"by these he maintains his throne.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Loving devotion and faithfulness preserve a king; by these he maintains his throne.

contentJson: [{"text":"The glory of young men is their strength,","poem":1},{"text":"and gray hair is the splendor of the old.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The glory of young men is their strength, and gray hair is the splendor of the old.

contentJson: [{"text":"Lashes and wounds scour evil,","poem":1},{"text":"and beatings cleanse the inmost parts.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Lashes and wounds scour evil, and beatings cleanse the inmost parts.

contentJson: [{"text":"The king’s heart is a waterway in the hand of the LORD;","poem":1},{"text":"He directs it where He pleases.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The king’s heart is a waterway in the hand of the LORD; He directs it where He pleases.

contentJson: [{"text":"All a man’s ways seem right to him,","poem":1},{"text":"but the LORD weighs the heart.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: All a man’s ways seem right to him, but the LORD weighs the heart.

contentJson: [{"text":"To do righteousness and justice","poem":1},{"text":"is more desirable to the LORD than sacrifice.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: To do righteousness and justice is more desirable to the LORD than sacrifice.

contentJson: [{"text":"Haughty eyes and a proud heart—","poem":1},{"text":"the guides of the wicked—are sin.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Haughty eyes and a proud heart— the guides of the wicked—are sin.

contentJson: [{"text":"The plans of the diligent bring plenty,","poem":1},{"text":"as surely as haste leads to poverty.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The plans of the diligent bring plenty, as surely as haste leads to poverty.

contentJson: [{"text":"Making a fortune by a lying tongue","poem":1},{"text":"is a vanishing mist, a deadly pursuit.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Making a fortune by a lying tongue is a vanishing mist, a deadly pursuit.

contentJson: [{"text":"The violence of the wicked will sweep them away","poem":1},{"text":"because they refuse to do what is just.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The violence of the wicked will sweep them away because they refuse to do what is just.

contentJson: [{"text":"The way of a guilty man is crooked,","poem":1},{"text":"but the conduct of the innocent is upright.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The way of a guilty man is crooked, but the conduct of the innocent is upright.

contentJson: [{"text":"Better to live on a corner of the roof","poem":1},{"text":"than to share a house with a quarrelsome wife.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Better to live on a corner of the roof than to share a house with a quarrelsome wife.

contentJson: [{"text":"The soul of the wicked man craves evil;","poem":1},{"text":"his neighbor finds no favor in his eyes.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The soul of the wicked man craves evil; his neighbor finds no favor in his eyes.

contentJson: [{"text":"When a mocker is punished, the simple gain wisdom;","poem":1},{"text":"and when a wise man is instructed, he acquires knowledge.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: When a mocker is punished, the simple gain wisdom; and when a wise man is instructed, he acquires knowledge.

contentJson: [{"text":"The Righteous One","poem":1},{"noteId":55},{"text":"considers the house of the wicked","poem":1},{"text":"and brings the wicked to ruin.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The Righteous One considers the house of the wicked and brings the wicked to ruin.

contentJson: [{"text":"Whoever shuts his ears to the cry of the poor,","poem":1},{"text":"he too shall cry out and receive no answer.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Whoever shuts his ears to the cry of the poor, he too shall cry out and receive no answer.

contentJson: [{"text":"A gift in secret soothes anger,","poem":1},{"text":"and a covert bribe","poem":2},{"noteId":56},{"text":"pacifies great wrath.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: A gift in secret soothes anger, and a covert bribe pacifies great wrath.

contentJson: [{"text":"Justice executed is a joy to the righteous,","poem":1},{"text":"but a terror to the workers of iniquity.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Justice executed is a joy to the righteous, but a terror to the workers of iniquity.

contentJson: [{"text":"The man who strays from the path of understanding","poem":1},{"text":"will rest in the assembly of the dead.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The man who strays from the path of understanding will rest in the assembly of the dead.

contentJson: [{"text":"He who loves pleasure will become poor;","poem":1},{"text":"the one who loves wine and oil will never be rich.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: He who loves pleasure will become poor; the one who loves wine and oil will never be rich.

contentJson: [{"text":"The wicked become a ransom for the righteous,","poem":1},{"text":"and the faithless for the upright.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The wicked become a ransom for the righteous, and the faithless for the upright.

contentJson: [{"text":"Better to live in the desert","poem":1},{"text":"than with a contentious and ill-tempered wife.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Better to live in the desert than with a contentious and ill-tempered wife.

contentJson: [{"text":"Precious treasures and oil are in the dwelling of the wise,","poem":1},{"text":"but a foolish man consumes them.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Precious treasures and oil are in the dwelling of the wise, but a foolish man consumes them.

contentJson: [{"text":"He who pursues righteousness and loving devotion","poem":1},{"text":"finds life, righteousness, and honor.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: He who pursues righteousness and loving devotion finds life, righteousness, and honor.

contentJson: [{"text":"A wise man scales the city of the mighty","poem":1},{"text":"and pulls down the stronghold in which they trust.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: A wise man scales the city of the mighty and pulls down the stronghold in which they trust.

contentJson: [{"text":"He who guards his mouth and tongue","poem":1},{"text":"keeps his soul from distress.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: He who guards his mouth and tongue keeps his soul from distress.

contentJson: [{"text":"Mocker is the name of the proud and arrogant man—","poem":1},{"text":"of him who acts with excessive pride.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Mocker is the name of the proud and arrogant man— of him who acts with excessive pride.

contentJson: [{"text":"The craving of the slacker kills him","poem":1},{"text":"because his hands refuse to work.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The craving of the slacker kills him because his hands refuse to work.

contentJson: [{"text":"All day long he covets more,","poem":1},{"text":"but the righteous give without restraint.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: All day long he covets more, but the righteous give without restraint.

contentJson: [{"text":"The sacrifice of the wicked is detestable—","poem":1},{"text":"how much more so when brought with ill intent!","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The sacrifice of the wicked is detestable— how much more so when brought with ill intent!

contentJson: [{"text":"A lying witness will perish,","poem":1},{"text":"but the man who listens to truth will speak forever.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: A lying witness will perish, but the man who listens to truth will speak forever.

contentJson: [{"text":"A wicked man hardens his face,","poem":1},{"noteId":57},{"text":"but the upright man makes his way sure.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: A wicked man hardens his face, but the upright man makes his way sure.

contentJson: [{"text":"There is no wisdom, no understanding, no counsel","poem":1},{"text":"that can prevail against the LORD.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: There is no wisdom, no understanding, no counsel that can prevail against the LORD.

contentJson: [{"text":"A horse is prepared for the day of battle,","poem":1},{"text":"but victory is of the LORD.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: A horse is prepared for the day of battle, but victory is of the LORD.

contentJson: [{"text":"A good name is more desirable than great riches;","poem":1},{"text":"favor is better than silver and gold.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: A good name is more desirable than great riches; favor is better than silver and gold.

contentJson: [{"text":"The rich and the poor have this in common:","poem":1},{"text":"The LORD is Maker of them all.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The rich and the poor have this in common: The LORD is Maker of them all.

contentJson: [{"text":"The prudent see danger and take cover,","poem":1},{"text":"but the simple keep going and suffer the consequences.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The prudent see danger and take cover, but the simple keep going and suffer the consequences.

contentJson: [{"text":"The rewards of humility and the fear of the LORD","poem":1},{"text":"are wealth and honor and life.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The rewards of humility and the fear of the LORD are wealth and honor and life.

contentJson: [{"text":"Thorns and snares lie on the path of the perverse;","poem":1},{"text":"he who guards his soul stays far from them.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Thorns and snares lie on the path of the perverse; he who guards his soul stays far from them.

contentJson: [{"text":"Train up a child in the way he should go,","poem":1},{"text":"and when he is old he will not depart from it.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Train up a child in the way he should go, and when he is old he will not depart from it.

contentJson: [{"text":"The rich rule over the poor,","poem":1},{"text":"and the borrower is slave to the lender.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The rich rule over the poor, and the borrower is slave to the lender.

contentJson: [{"text":"He who sows injustice will reap disaster,","poem":1},{"text":"and the rod of his fury will be destroyed.","poem":2},{"noteId":58}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: He who sows injustice will reap disaster, and the rod of his fury will be destroyed.

contentJson: [{"text":"A generous man","poem":1},{"noteId":59},{"text":"will be blessed,","poem":1},{"text":"for he shares his bread with the poor.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: A generous man will be blessed, for he shares his bread with the poor.

contentJson: [{"text":"Drive out the mocker, and conflict will depart;","poem":1},{"text":"even quarreling and insults will cease.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Drive out the mocker, and conflict will depart; even quarreling and insults will cease.

contentJson: [{"text":"He who loves a pure heart and gracious lips","poem":1},{"text":"will have the king for a friend.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: He who loves a pure heart and gracious lips will have the king for a friend.

contentJson: [{"text":"The LORD’s eyes keep watch over knowledge,","poem":1},{"text":"but He frustrates the words of the faithless.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The LORD’s eyes keep watch over knowledge, but He frustrates the words of the faithless.

contentJson: [{"text":"The slacker says, “There is a lion outside!","poem":1},{"text":"I will be slain in the streets!”","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The slacker says, “There is a lion outside! I will be slain in the streets!”

contentJson: [{"text":"The mouth of an adulteress is a deep pit;","poem":1},{"text":"he who is under the wrath of the LORD will fall into it.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The mouth of an adulteress is a deep pit; he who is under the wrath of the LORD will fall into it.

contentJson: [{"text":"Foolishness is bound up in the heart of a child,","poem":1},{"text":"but the rod of discipline drives it far from him.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Foolishness is bound up in the heart of a child, but the rod of discipline drives it far from him.

contentJson: [{"text":"Oppressing the poor to enrich oneself or giving gifts to the rich","poem":1},{"text":"will surely lead to poverty.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Oppressing the poor to enrich oneself or giving gifts to the rich will surely lead to poverty.

contentJson: [{"text":"Incline your ear and hear the words of the wise—","poem":1},{"text":"apply your mind to my knowledge—","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Incline your ear and hear the words of the wise— apply your mind to my knowledge—

contentJson: [{"text":"for it is pleasing when you keep them within you","poem":1},{"text":"and they are constantly on your lips.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: for it is pleasing when you keep them within you and they are constantly on your lips.

contentJson: [{"text":"So that your trust may be in the LORD,","poem":1},{"text":"I instruct you today—yes, you.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: So that your trust may be in the LORD, I instruct you today—yes, you.

contentJson: [{"text":"Have I not written for you thirty sayings","poem":1},{"noteId":60},{"text":"about counsel and knowledge,","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Have I not written for you thirty sayings about counsel and knowledge,

contentJson: [{"text":"to show you true and reliable words,","poem":1},{"text":"that you may soundly answer those who sent you?","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: to show you true and reliable words, that you may soundly answer those who sent you?

contentJson: [{"text":"Do not rob a poor man because he is poor,","poem":1},{"text":"and do not crush the afflicted at the gate,","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Do not rob a poor man because he is poor, and do not crush the afflicted at the gate,

contentJson: [{"text":"for the LORD will take up their case","poem":1},{"text":"and will plunder those who rob them.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: for the LORD will take up their case and will plunder those who rob them.

contentJson: [{"text":"Do not make friends with an angry man,","poem":1},{"text":"and do not associate with a hot-tempered man,","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Do not make friends with an angry man, and do not associate with a hot-tempered man,

contentJson: [{"text":"or you may learn his ways","poem":1},{"text":"and entangle yourself in a snare.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: or you may learn his ways and entangle yourself in a snare.

contentJson: [{"text":"Do not be one who gives pledges,","poem":1},{"text":"who puts up security for debts.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Do not be one who gives pledges, who puts up security for debts.

contentJson: [{"text":"If you have nothing with which to pay,","poem":1},{"text":"why should your bed be taken from under you?","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: If you have nothing with which to pay, why should your bed be taken from under you?

contentJson: [{"text":"Do not move an ancient boundary stone","poem":1},{"text":"which your fathers have placed.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Do not move an ancient boundary stone which your fathers have placed.

contentJson: [{"text":"Do you see a man skilled in his work?","poem":1},{"text":"He will be stationed in the presence of kings;","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"he will not stand before obscure men.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
Do you see a man skilled in his work? He will be stationed in the presence of kings; 
he will not stand before obscure men.

contentJson: [{"text":"When you sit down to dine with a ruler,","poem":1},{"text":"consider carefully what is set before you,","poem":2},{"noteId":61}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: When you sit down to dine with a ruler, consider carefully what is set before you,

contentJson: [{"text":"and put a knife to your throat","poem":1},{"text":"if you possess a great appetite.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: and put a knife to your throat if you possess a great appetite.

contentJson: [{"text":"Do not crave his delicacies,","poem":1},{"text":"for that food is deceptive.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Do not crave his delicacies, for that food is deceptive.

contentJson: [{"text":"Do not wear yourself out to get rich;","poem":1},{"text":"be wise enough to restrain yourself.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Do not wear yourself out to get rich; be wise enough to restrain yourself.

contentJson: [{"text":"When you glance at wealth, it disappears,","poem":1},{"text":"for it makes wings for itself","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"and flies like an eagle to the sky.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
When you glance at wealth, it disappears, for it makes wings for itself 
and flies like an eagle to the sky.

contentJson: [{"text":"Do not eat the bread of a stingy man,","poem":1},{"noteId":62},{"text":"and do not crave his delicacies;","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Do not eat the bread of a stingy man, and do not crave his delicacies;

contentJson: [{"text":"for he is keeping track,","poem":1},{"text":"inwardly counting the cost.","poem":2},{"noteId":63},{"text":"“Eat and drink,” he says to you,","poem":1},{"text":"but his heart is not with you.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: for he is keeping track, inwardly counting the cost. “Eat and drink,” he says to you, but his heart is not with you.

contentJson: [{"text":"You will vomit up what little you have eaten","poem":1},{"text":"and waste your pleasant words.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: You will vomit up what little you have eaten and waste your pleasant words.

contentJson: [{"text":"Do not speak to a fool,","poem":1},{"text":"for he will despise the wisdom of your words.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Do not speak to a fool, for he will despise the wisdom of your words.

contentJson: [{"text":"Do not move an ancient boundary stone","poem":1},{"text":"or encroach on the fields of the fatherless,","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Do not move an ancient boundary stone or encroach on the fields of the fatherless,

contentJson: [{"text":"for their Redeemer is strong;","poem":1},{"text":"He will take up their case against you.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: for their Redeemer is strong; He will take up their case against you.

contentJson: [{"text":"Apply your heart to instruction","poem":1},{"text":"and your ears to words of knowledge.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Apply your heart to instruction and your ears to words of knowledge.

contentJson: [{"text":"Do not withhold discipline from a child;","poem":1},{"text":"although you strike him with a rod, he will not die.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Do not withhold discipline from a child; although you strike him with a rod, he will not die.

contentJson: [{"text":"Strike him with a rod,","poem":1},{"text":"and you will deliver his soul from Sheol.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Strike him with a rod, and you will deliver his soul from Sheol.

contentJson: [{"text":"My son, if your heart is wise,","poem":1},{"text":"my own heart will indeed rejoice.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: My son, if your heart is wise, my own heart will indeed rejoice.

contentJson: [{"text":"My inmost being","poem":1},{"noteId":64},{"text":"will rejoice","poem":1},{"text":"when your lips speak what is right.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: My inmost being will rejoice when your lips speak what is right.

contentJson: [{"text":"Do not let your heart envy sinners,","poem":1},{"text":"but always continue in the fear of the LORD.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Do not let your heart envy sinners, but always continue in the fear of the LORD.

contentJson: [{"text":"For surely there is a future,","poem":1},{"text":"and your hope will not be cut off.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: For surely there is a future, and your hope will not be cut off.

contentJson: [{"text":"Listen, my son, and be wise,","poem":1},{"text":"and guide your heart on the right course.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Listen, my son, and be wise, and guide your heart on the right course.

contentJson: [{"text":"Do not join those who drink too much wine","poem":1},{"text":"or gorge themselves on meat.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Do not join those who drink too much wine or gorge themselves on meat.

contentJson: [{"text":"For the drunkard and the glutton will come to poverty,","poem":1},{"text":"and drowsiness will clothe them in rags.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: For the drunkard and the glutton will come to poverty, and drowsiness will clothe them in rags.

contentJson: [{"text":"Listen to your father who gave you life,","poem":1},{"text":"and do not despise your mother when she is old.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Listen to your father who gave you life, and do not despise your mother when she is old.

contentJson: [{"text":"Invest in truth and never sell it—","poem":1},{"text":"in wisdom and instruction and understanding.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Invest in truth and never sell it— in wisdom and instruction and understanding.

contentJson: [{"text":"The father of a righteous man will greatly rejoice,","poem":1},{"text":"and he who fathers a wise son will delight in him.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The father of a righteous man will greatly rejoice, and he who fathers a wise son will delight in him.

contentJson: [{"text":"May your father and mother be glad,","poem":1},{"text":"and may she who gave you birth rejoice!","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: May your father and mother be glad, and may she who gave you birth rejoice!

contentJson: [{"text":"My son, give me your heart,","poem":1},{"text":"and let your eyes delight in my ways.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: My son, give me your heart, and let your eyes delight in my ways.

contentJson: [{"text":"For a prostitute is a deep pit,","poem":1},{"text":"and an adulteress","poem":2},{"noteId":65},{"text":"is a narrow well.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: For a prostitute is a deep pit, and an adulteress is a narrow well.

contentJson: [{"text":"Like a robber she lies in wait","poem":1},{"text":"and multiplies the faithless among men.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Like a robber she lies in wait and multiplies the faithless among men.

contentJson: [{"text":"Who has woe? Who has sorrow?","poem":1},{"text":"Who has contentions? Who has complaints?","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"Who has needless wounds? Who has bloodshot eyes?","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
Who has woe? Who has sorrow? Who has contentions? Who has complaints? 
Who has needless wounds? Who has bloodshot eyes?

contentJson: [{"text":"Those who linger over wine,","poem":1},{"text":"who go to taste mixed drinks.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Those who linger over wine, who go to taste mixed drinks.

contentJson: [{"text":"Do not gaze at wine while it is red,","poem":1},{"text":"when it sparkles in the cup","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"and goes down smoothly.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
Do not gaze at wine while it is red, when it sparkles in the cup 
and goes down smoothly.

contentJson: [{"text":"In the end it bites like a snake","poem":1},{"text":"and stings like a viper.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: In the end it bites like a snake and stings like a viper.

contentJson: [{"text":"Your eyes will see strange things,","poem":1},{"text":"and your mind will utter perversities.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Your eyes will see strange things, and your mind will utter perversities.

contentJson: [{"text":"You will be like one sleeping on the high seas","poem":1},{"text":"or lying on the top of a mast:","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: You will be like one sleeping on the high seas or lying on the top of a mast:

contentJson: [{"text":"“They struck me, but I feel no pain!","poem":1},{"text":"They beat me, but I did not know it!","poem":2},{"text":"When can I wake up","poem":1},{"text":"to search for another drink?”","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: “They struck me, but I feel no pain! They beat me, but I did not know it! When can I wake up to search for another drink?”

contentJson: [{"text":"Do not envy wicked men","poem":1},{"text":"or desire their company;","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Do not envy wicked men or desire their company;

contentJson: [{"text":"for their hearts devise violence,","poem":1},{"text":"and their lips declare trouble.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: for their hearts devise violence, and their lips declare trouble.

contentJson: [{"text":"By wisdom a house is built","poem":1},{"text":"and by understanding it is established;","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: By wisdom a house is built and by understanding it is established;

contentJson: [{"text":"through knowledge its rooms are filled","poem":1},{"text":"with every precious and beautiful treasure.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: through knowledge its rooms are filled with every precious and beautiful treasure.

contentJson: [{"text":"A wise man is strong,","poem":1},{"noteId":66},{"text":"and a man of knowledge enhances his strength.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: A wise man is strong, and a man of knowledge enhances his strength.

contentJson: [{"text":"Only with sound guidance should you wage war,","poem":1},{"text":"and victory lies in a multitude of counselors.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Only with sound guidance should you wage war, and victory lies in a multitude of counselors.

contentJson: [{"text":"Wisdom is too high for a fool;","poem":1},{"text":"he does not open his mouth in the meeting place.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Wisdom is too high for a fool; he does not open his mouth in the meeting place.

contentJson: [{"text":"He who plots evil","poem":1},{"text":"will be called a schemer.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: He who plots evil will be called a schemer.

contentJson: [{"text":"A foolish scheme is sin,","poem":1},{"text":"and a mocker is detestable to men.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: A foolish scheme is sin, and a mocker is detestable to men.

contentJson: [{"text":"If you faint in the day of distress,","poem":1},{"text":"how small is your strength!","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: If you faint in the day of distress, how small is your strength!

contentJson: [{"text":"Rescue those being led away to death,","poem":1},{"text":"and restrain those stumbling toward the slaughter.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Rescue those being led away to death, and restrain those stumbling toward the slaughter.

contentJson: [{"text":"If you say, “Behold, we did not know about this,”","poem":1},{"text":"does not He who weighs hearts consider it?","poem":2},{"text":"Does not the One who guards your life know?","poem":1},{"text":"Will He not repay a man according to his deeds?","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: If you say, “Behold, we did not know about this,” does not He who weighs hearts consider it? Does not the One who guards your life know? Will He not repay a man according to his deeds?

contentJson: [{"text":"Eat honey, my son, for it is good,","poem":1},{"text":"and the honeycomb is sweet to your taste.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Eat honey, my son, for it is good, and the honeycomb is sweet to your taste.

contentJson: [{"text":"Know therefore that wisdom is sweet to your soul.","poem":1},{"text":"If you find it, there is a future for you,","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"and your hope will never be cut off.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
Know therefore that wisdom is sweet to your soul. If you find it, there is a future for you, 
and your hope will never be cut off.

contentJson: [{"text":"Do not lie in wait, O wicked man, near the dwelling of the righteous;","poem":1},{"text":"do not destroy his resting place.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Do not lie in wait, O wicked man, near the dwelling of the righteous; do not destroy his resting place.

contentJson: [{"text":"For though a righteous man may fall seven times, he still gets up;","poem":1},{"text":"but the wicked stumble in bad times.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: For though a righteous man may fall seven times, he still gets up; but the wicked stumble in bad times.

contentJson: [{"text":"Do not gloat when your enemy falls,","poem":1},{"text":"and do not let your heart rejoice when he stumbles,","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Do not gloat when your enemy falls, and do not let your heart rejoice when he stumbles,

contentJson: [{"text":"or the LORD will see and disapprove,","poem":1},{"text":"and turn His wrath away from him.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: or the LORD will see and disapprove, and turn His wrath away from him.

contentJson: [{"text":"Do not fret over evildoers,","poem":1},{"text":"and do not be envious of the wicked.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Do not fret over evildoers, and do not be envious of the wicked.

contentJson: [{"text":"For the evil man has no future;","poem":1},{"text":"the lamp of the wicked will be extinguished.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: For the evil man has no future; the lamp of the wicked will be extinguished.

contentJson: [{"text":"My son, fear the LORD and the king,","poem":1},{"text":"and do not associate with the rebellious.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: My son, fear the LORD and the king, and do not associate with the rebellious.

contentJson: [{"text":"For they will bring sudden destruction.","poem":1},{"text":"Who knows what ruin they can bring?","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: For they will bring sudden destruction. Who knows what ruin they can bring?

contentJson: ["These also are sayings of the wise:",{"text":"To show partiality in judgment","poem":1},{"text":"is not good.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: These also are sayings of the wise: To show partiality in judgment is not good.

contentJson: [{"text":"Whoever tells the guilty, “You are innocent”—","poem":1},{"text":"peoples will curse him, and nations will denounce him;","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Whoever tells the guilty, “You are innocent”— peoples will curse him, and nations will denounce him;

contentJson: [{"text":"but it will go well with those who convict the guilty,","poem":1},{"text":"and rich blessing will come upon them.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: but it will go well with those who convict the guilty, and rich blessing will come upon them.

contentJson: [{"text":"An honest answer given","poem":1},{"text":"is like a kiss on the lips.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: An honest answer given is like a kiss on the lips.

contentJson: [{"text":"Complete your outdoor work and prepare your field;","poem":1},{"text":"after that, you may build your house.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Complete your outdoor work and prepare your field; after that, you may build your house.

contentJson: [{"text":"Do not testify against your neighbor without cause,","poem":1},{"text":"and do not deceive with your lips.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Do not testify against your neighbor without cause, and do not deceive with your lips.

contentJson: [{"text":"Do not say, “I will do to him as he has done to me;","poem":1},{"text":"I will repay the man according to his work.”","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Do not say, “I will do to him as he has done to me; I will repay the man according to his work.”

contentJson: [{"text":"I went past the field of a slacker","poem":1},{"text":"and by the vineyard of a man lacking judgment.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: I went past the field of a slacker and by the vineyard of a man lacking judgment.

contentJson: [{"text":"Thorns had grown up everywhere,","poem":1},{"text":"thistles had covered the ground,","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"and the stone wall was broken down.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
Thorns had grown up everywhere, thistles had covered the ground, 
and the stone wall was broken down.

contentJson: [{"text":"I observed and took it to heart;","poem":1},{"text":"I looked and received instruction:","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: I observed and took it to heart; I looked and received instruction:

contentJson: [{"text":"A little sleep, a little slumber,","poem":1},{"text":"a little folding of the hands to rest,","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: A little sleep, a little slumber, a little folding of the hands to rest,

contentJson: [{"text":"and poverty will come upon you like a robber,","poem":1},{"text":"and need like a bandit.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: and poverty will come upon you like a robber, and need like a bandit.

contentJson: ["These are additional proverbs of Solomon, which were copied by the men of Hezekiah king of Judah:"]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: These are additional proverbs of Solomon, which were copied by the men of Hezekiah king of Judah:

contentJson: [{"text":"It is the glory of God to conceal a matter","poem":1},{"text":"and the glory of kings to search it out.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: It is the glory of God to conceal a matter and the glory of kings to search it out.

contentJson: [{"text":"As the heavens are high and the earth is deep,","poem":1},{"text":"so the hearts of kings cannot be searched.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: As the heavens are high and the earth is deep, so the hearts of kings cannot be searched.

contentJson: [{"text":"Remove the dross from the silver,","poem":1},{"text":"and a vessel for a silversmith will come forth.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Remove the dross from the silver, and a vessel for a silversmith will come forth.

contentJson: [{"text":"Remove the wicked from the king’s presence,","poem":1},{"text":"and his throne will be established in righteousness.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Remove the wicked from the king’s presence, and his throne will be established in righteousness.

contentJson: [{"text":"Do not exalt yourself in the presence of the king,","poem":1},{"text":"and do not stand in the place of great men;","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Do not exalt yourself in the presence of the king, and do not stand in the place of great men;

contentJson: [{"text":"for it is better that he says to you, “Come up here!”","poem":1},{"text":"than that you should be demoted in the presence of the prince.","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"Even what","poem":1},{"noteId":67},{"text":"you have seen with your own eyes,","poem":1}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
for it is better that he says to you, “Come up here!” than that you should be demoted in the presence of the prince. 
Even what you have seen with your own eyes,

contentJson: [{"text":"do not bring hastily to court.","poem":2},{"text":"Otherwise, what will you do in the end","poem":1},{"text":"when your neighbor puts you to shame?","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: do not bring hastily to court. Otherwise, what will you do in the end when your neighbor puts you to shame?

contentJson: [{"text":"Argue your case with your neighbor","poem":1},{"text":"without betraying another’s confidence,","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Argue your case with your neighbor without betraying another’s confidence,

contentJson: [{"text":"lest the one who hears may disgrace you,","poem":1},{"text":"and your infamy never go away.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: lest the one who hears may disgrace you, and your infamy never go away.

contentJson: [{"text":"A word fitly spoken","poem":1},{"text":"is like apples of gold in settings of silver.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: A word fitly spoken is like apples of gold in settings of silver.

contentJson: [{"text":"Like an earring of gold or an ornament of fine gold","poem":1},{"text":"is a wise man’s rebuke to a listening ear.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Like an earring of gold or an ornament of fine gold is a wise man’s rebuke to a listening ear.

contentJson: [{"text":"Like the cold of snow in the time of harvest","poem":1},{"text":"is a trustworthy messenger to those who send him;","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"he refreshes the soul of his masters.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
Like the cold of snow in the time of harvest is a trustworthy messenger to those who send him; 
he refreshes the soul of his masters.

contentJson: [{"text":"Like clouds and wind without rain","poem":1},{"text":"is the man who boasts of gifts never given.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Like clouds and wind without rain is the man who boasts of gifts never given.

contentJson: [{"text":"Through patience a ruler can be persuaded,","poem":1},{"text":"and a gentle tongue can break a bone.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Through patience a ruler can be persuaded, and a gentle tongue can break a bone.

contentJson: [{"text":"If you find honey, eat just what you need,","poem":1},{"text":"lest you have too much and vomit it up.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: If you find honey, eat just what you need, lest you have too much and vomit it up.

contentJson: [{"text":"Seldom set foot in your neighbor’s house,","poem":1},{"text":"lest he grow weary and hate you.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Seldom set foot in your neighbor’s house, lest he grow weary and hate you.

contentJson: [{"text":"Like a club or sword or sharp arrow","poem":1},{"text":"is a man who bears false witness against his neighbor.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Like a club or sword or sharp arrow is a man who bears false witness against his neighbor.

contentJson: [{"text":"Like a broken tooth or a foot out of joint","poem":1},{"text":"is confidence in a faithless man in time of trouble.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Like a broken tooth or a foot out of joint is confidence in a faithless man in time of trouble.

contentJson: [{"text":"Like one who removes a garment on a cold day","poem":1},{"text":"or vinegar poured on a wound","poem":2},{"noteId":68},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"is one who sings songs to a heavy heart.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
Like one who removes a garment on a cold day or vinegar poured on a wound 
is one who sings songs to a heavy heart.

contentJson: [{"text":"If your enemy is hungry, give him food to eat,","poem":1},{"text":"and if he is thirsty, give him water to drink.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: If your enemy is hungry, give him food to eat, and if he is thirsty, give him water to drink.
