contentJson: [{"text":"For in so doing, you will heap burning coals on his head,","poem":1},{"noteId":69},{"text":"and the LORD will reward you.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: For in so doing, you will heap burning coals on his head, and the LORD will reward you.

contentJson: [{"text":"As the north wind brings forth rain,","poem":1},{"text":"so a backbiting tongue brings angry looks.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: As the north wind brings forth rain, so a backbiting tongue brings angry looks.

contentJson: [{"text":"Better to live on a corner of the roof","poem":1},{"text":"than to share a house with a quarrelsome wife.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Better to live on a corner of the roof than to share a house with a quarrelsome wife.

contentJson: [{"text":"Like cold water to a weary soul","poem":1},{"text":"is good news from a distant land.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Like cold water to a weary soul is good news from a distant land.

contentJson: [{"text":"Like a muddied spring or a polluted well","poem":1},{"text":"is a righteous man who gives way to the wicked.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Like a muddied spring or a polluted well is a righteous man who gives way to the wicked.

contentJson: [{"text":"It is not good to eat too much honey","poem":1},{"text":"or to search out one’s own glory.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: It is not good to eat too much honey or to search out one’s own glory.

contentJson: [{"text":"Like a city whose walls are broken down","poem":1},{"text":"is a man who does not control his temper.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Like a city whose walls are broken down is a man who does not control his temper.

contentJson: [{"text":"Like snow in summer and rain at harvest,","poem":1},{"text":"honor does not befit a fool.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Like snow in summer and rain at harvest, honor does not befit a fool.

contentJson: [{"text":"Like a fluttering sparrow or darting swallow,","poem":1},{"text":"an undeserved curse does not come to rest.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Like a fluttering sparrow or darting swallow, an undeserved curse does not come to rest.

contentJson: [{"text":"A whip for the horse, a bridle for the donkey,","poem":1},{"text":"and a rod for the backs of fools!","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: A whip for the horse, a bridle for the donkey, and a rod for the backs of fools!

contentJson: [{"text":"Do not answer a fool according to his folly,","poem":1},{"text":"or you yourself will be like him.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Do not answer a fool according to his folly, or you yourself will be like him.

contentJson: [{"text":"Answer a fool according to his folly,","poem":1},{"text":"lest he become wise in his own eyes.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Answer a fool according to his folly, lest he become wise in his own eyes.

contentJson: [{"text":"Like cutting off one’s own feet or drinking violence","poem":1},{"text":"is the sending of a message by the hand of a fool.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Like cutting off one’s own feet or drinking violence is the sending of a message by the hand of a fool.

contentJson: [{"text":"Like lame legs hanging limp","poem":1},{"text":"is a proverb in the mouth of a fool.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Like lame legs hanging limp is a proverb in the mouth of a fool.

contentJson: [{"text":"Like binding a stone into a sling","poem":1},{"text":"is the giving of honor to a fool.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Like binding a stone into a sling is the giving of honor to a fool.

contentJson: [{"text":"Like a thorn that falls into the hand of a drunkard","poem":1},{"text":"is a proverb in the mouth of a fool.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Like a thorn that falls into the hand of a drunkard is a proverb in the mouth of a fool.

contentJson: [{"text":"Like an archer who wounds at random","poem":1},{"text":"is he who hires a fool or passerby.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Like an archer who wounds at random is he who hires a fool or passerby.

contentJson: [{"text":"As a dog returns to its vomit,","poem":1},{"noteId":70},{"text":"so a fool repeats his folly.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: As a dog returns to its vomit, so a fool repeats his folly.

contentJson: [{"text":"Do you see a man who is wise in his own eyes?","poem":1},{"text":"There is more hope for a fool than for him.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Do you see a man who is wise in his own eyes? There is more hope for a fool than for him.

contentJson: [{"text":"The slacker says, “A lion is in the road!","poem":1},{"text":"A fierce lion roams the public square!”","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The slacker says, “A lion is in the road! A fierce lion roams the public square!”

contentJson: [{"text":"As a door turns on its hinges,","poem":1},{"text":"so the slacker turns on his bed.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: As a door turns on its hinges, so the slacker turns on his bed.

contentJson: [{"text":"The slacker buries his hand in the dish;","poem":1},{"text":"it wearies him to bring it back to his mouth.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The slacker buries his hand in the dish; it wearies him to bring it back to his mouth.

contentJson: [{"text":"The slacker is wiser in his own eyes","poem":1},{"text":"than seven men who answer discreetly.","poem":2}]

text: The slacker is wiser in his own eyes than seven men who answer discreetly.

contentJson: [{"text":"Like one who grabs a dog by the ears","poem":1},{"text":"is a passerby who meddles in a quarrel not his own.","poem":2}]

contentJson: [{"text":"Like a madman shooting firebrands","poem":1},{"text":"and deadly arrows,","poem":2}]

contentJson: [{"text":"so is the man who deceives his neighbor","poem":1},{"text":"and says, “I was only joking!”","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: so is the man who deceives his neighbor and says, “I was only joking!”

contentJson: [{"text":"Without wood, a fire goes out;","poem":1},{"text":"without gossip, a conflict ceases.","poem":2}]

name: Berean Standard Bible

contentJson: [{"text":"The words of a gossip are like choice morsels","poem":1},{"text":"that go down into the inmost being.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible

contentJson: [{"text":"Like glaze covering an earthen vessel","poem":1},{"text":"are burning","poem":2},{"noteId":71},{"text":"lips and a wicked heart.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Like glaze covering an earthen vessel are burning lips and a wicked heart.

contentJson: [{"text":"A hateful man disguises himself with his speech,","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"but he lays up deceit in his heart.","poem":2}]

text:
A hateful man disguises himself with his speech, 
but he lays up deceit in his heart.

contentJson: [{"text":"When he speaks graciously, do not believe him,","poem":1},{"text":"for seven abominations fill his heart.","poem":2}]

contentJson: [{"text":"He who digs a pit will fall into it,","poem":1},{"text":"and he who rolls a stone will have it roll back on him.","poem":2}]

contentJson: [{"text":"Let another praise you, and not your own mouth—","poem":1},{"text":"a stranger, and not your own lips.","poem":2}]

contentJson: [{"text":"A stone is heavy and sand is a burden,","poem":1},{"text":"but aggravation from a fool outweighs them both.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible

contentJson: [{"text":"Wrath is cruel and anger is like a flood,","poem":1},{"text":"but who can withstand jealousy?","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible

contentJson: [{"text":"Better an open rebuke","poem":1},{"text":"than love that is concealed.","poem":2}]

contentJson: [{"text":"The wounds of a friend are faithful,","poem":1},{"text":"but the kisses of an enemy are deceitful.","poem":2}]

text: The wounds of a friend are faithful, but the kisses of an enemy are deceitful.

contentJson: [{"text":"The soul that is full loathes honey,","poem":1},{"text":"but to a hungry soul, any bitter thing is sweet.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible

name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Like a bird that strays from its nest is a man who wanders from his home.

contentJson: [{"text":"Oil and incense bring joy to the heart,","poem":1},{"text":"and the sweetness of a friend is counsel to the soul.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Oil and incense bring joy to the heart, and the sweetness of a friend is counsel to the soul.

contentJson: [{"text":"Do not forsake your friend or your father’s friend,","poem":1},{"text":"and do not go to your brother’s house","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"in the day of your calamity;","poem":2},{"text":"better a neighbor nearby","poem":1},{"text":"than a brother far away.","poem":2}]

contentJson: [{"text":"Be wise, my son, and bring joy to my heart,","poem":1},{"text":"so that I can answer him who taunts me.","poem":2}]

contentJson: [{"text":"The prudent see danger and take cover;","poem":1},{"text":"but the simple keep going and pay the penalty.","poem":2}]

text: The prudent see danger and take cover; but the simple keep going and pay the penalty.

contentJson: [{"text":"If one blesses his neighbor with a loud voice early in the morning,","poem":1},{"text":"it will be counted to him as a curse.","poem":2}]

contentJson: [{"text":"As iron sharpens iron,","poem":1},{"text":"so one man sharpens another.","poem":2},{"noteId":73}]
name: Berean Standard Bible

contentJson: [{"text":"Whoever tends a fig tree will eat its fruit,","poem":1},{"text":"and he who looks after his master will be honored.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible

name: Berean Standard Bible

contentJson: [{"text":"Sheol and Abaddon","poem":1},{"noteId":74},{"text":"are never satisfied;","poem":1},{"text":"so the eyes of man are never satisfied.","poem":2}]

contentJson: [{"text":"A crucible for silver and a furnace for gold,","poem":1},{"text":"but a man is tested by the praise accorded him.","poem":2}]

contentJson: [{"text":"Though you grind a fool like grain with mortar and a pestle,","poem":1},{"text":"yet his folly will not depart from him.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Though you grind a fool like grain with mortar and a pestle, yet his folly will not depart from him.

contentJson: [{"text":"Be sure to know the state of your flocks,","poem":1},{"text":"and pay close attention to your herds;","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible

contentJson: [{"text":"for riches are not forever,","poem":1},{"text":"nor does a crown endure to every generation.","poem":2}]

name: Berean Standard Bible
text: the lambs will provide you with clothing, and the goats with the price of a field.

contentJson: [{"text":"You will have plenty of goats’ milk to feed you—","poem":1},{"text":"food for your household","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"and nourishment for your maidservants.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
You will have plenty of goats’ milk to feed you— food for your household

contentJson: [{"text":"The wicked flee when no one pursues,","poem":1},{"text":"but the righteous are as bold as a lion.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The wicked flee when no one pursues, but the righteous are as bold as a lion.

name: Berean Standard Bible
text: A land in rebellion has many rulers, but a man of understanding and knowledge maintains order.

name: Berean Standard Bible
text: A destitute leader who oppresses the poor is like a driving rain that leaves no food.

contentJson: [{"text":"Those who forsake the law praise the wicked,","poem":1},{"text":"but those who keep the law resist them.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Those who forsake the law praise the wicked, but those who keep the law resist them.

contentJson: [{"text":"Evil men do not understand justice,","poem":1},{"text":"but those who seek the LORD comprehend fully.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Evil men do not understand justice, but those who seek the LORD comprehend fully.

contentJson: [{"text":"Better a poor man who walks with integrity","poem":1},{"text":"than a rich man whose ways are perverse.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Better a poor man who walks with integrity than a rich man whose ways are perverse.

contentJson: [{"text":"A discerning son keeps the law,","poem":1},{"text":"but a companion of gluttons disgraces his father.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: A discerning son keeps the law, but a companion of gluttons disgraces his father.

name: Berean Standard Bible
text: He who increases his wealth by interest and usury lays it up for one who is kind to the poor.

name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Whoever turns his ear away from hearing the law, even his prayer is detestable.

name: Berean Standard Bible
text: He who leads the upright along the path of evil will fall into his own pit, but the blameless will inherit what is good.

name: Berean Standard Bible
text: A rich man is wise in his own eyes, but a poor man with discernment sees through him.

name: Berean Standard Bible

contentJson: [{"text":"Blessed is the man who is always reverent,","poem":1},{"noteId":75},{"text":"but he who hardens his heart falls into trouble.","poem":2}]

contentJson: [{"text":"Like a roaring lion or a charging bear","poem":1},{"text":"is a wicked ruler over a helpless people.","poem":2}]

text: Like a roaring lion or a charging bear is a wicked ruler over a helpless people.

contentJson: [{"text":"A leader who lacks judgment is also a great oppressor,","poem":1},{"text":"but he who hates dishonest profit will prolong his days.","poem":2}]

text: A leader who lacks judgment is also a great oppressor, but he who hates dishonest profit will prolong his days.

text: A man burdened by bloodguilt will flee into the Pit; let no one support him.

contentJson: [{"text":"The one who works his land will have plenty of food,","poem":1},{"text":"but whoever chases fantasies will have his fill of poverty.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The one who works his land will have plenty of food, but whoever chases fantasies will have his fill of poverty.

name: Berean Standard Bible
text: A faithful man will abound with blessings, but one eager to be rich will not go unpunished.

name: Berean Standard Bible
text: To show partiality is not good, yet a man will do wrong for a piece of bread.

name: Berean Standard Bible
text: A stingy man hastens after wealth and does not know that poverty awaits him.

name: Berean Standard Bible
text: He who rebukes a man will later find more favor than one who flatters with his tongue.

name: Berean Standard Bible
text: He who robs his father or mother, saying, “It is not wrong,” is a companion to the man who destroys.

name: Berean Standard Bible
text: A greedy man stirs up strife, but he who trusts in the LORD will prosper.

contentJson: [{"text":"He who trusts in himself is a fool,","poem":1},{"text":"but one who walks in wisdom will be safe.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: He who trusts in himself is a fool, but one who walks in wisdom will be safe.

contentJson: [{"text":"Whoever gives to the poor will not be in need,","poem":1},{"text":"but he who hides his eyes will receive many curses.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Whoever gives to the poor will not be in need, but he who hides his eyes will receive many curses.

name: Berean Standard Bible
text: When the wicked come to power, people hide themselves; but when they perish, the righteous flourish.

name: Berean Standard Bible
text: A man who remains stiff-necked after much reproof will suddenly be shattered beyond recovery.

contentJson: [{"text":"When the righteous flourish, the people rejoice,","poem":1},{"text":"but when the wicked rule, the people groan.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: When the righteous flourish, the people rejoice, but when the wicked rule, the people groan.

name: Berean Standard Bible
text: A man who loves wisdom brings joy to his father, but a companion of prostitutes squanders his wealth.

contentJson: [{"text":"By justice a king brings stability to the land,","poem":1},{"text":"but a man who exacts tribute","poem":2},{"noteId":78},{"text":"demolishes it.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible

contentJson: [{"text":"A man who flatters his neighbor","poem":1},{"text":"spreads a net for his feet.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: A man who flatters his neighbor spreads a net for his feet.

contentJson: [{"text":"An evil man is caught by his own sin,","poem":1},{"text":"but a righteous one sings and rejoices.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: An evil man is caught by his own sin, but a righteous one sings and rejoices.

contentJson: [{"text":"The righteous consider the cause of the poor,","poem":1},{"text":"but the wicked have no regard for such concerns.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The righteous consider the cause of the poor, but the wicked have no regard for such concerns.

contentJson: [{"text":"Mockers inflame a city,","poem":1},{"text":"but the wise turn away anger.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Mockers inflame a city, but the wise turn away anger.

contentJson: [{"text":"Men of bloodshed hate a blameless man,","poem":1},{"text":"but the upright care for his life.","poem":2},{"noteId":79}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Men of bloodshed hate a blameless man, but the upright care for his life.

name: Berean Standard Bible
text: A fool vents all his anger, but a wise man holds it back.

name: Berean Standard Bible

contentJson: [{"text":"The poor man and the oppressor have this in common:","poem":1},{"text":"The LORD gives light to the eyes of both.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The poor man and the oppressor have this in common: The LORD gives light to the eyes of both.

contentJson: [{"text":"A king who judges the poor with fairness—","poem":1},{"text":"his throne will be established forever.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: A king who judges the poor with fairness— his throne will be established forever.

contentJson: [{"text":"A rod of correction imparts wisdom,","poem":1},{"text":"but a child left to himself disgraces his mother.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: A rod of correction imparts wisdom, but a child left to himself disgraces his mother.

contentJson: [{"text":"When the wicked thrive, rebellion increases;","poem":1},{"text":"but the righteous will see their downfall.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: When the wicked thrive, rebellion increases; but the righteous will see their downfall.

contentJson: [{"text":"Discipline your son, and he will give you rest;","poem":1},{"text":"he will bring delight to your soul.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Discipline your son, and he will give you rest; he will bring delight to your soul.

contentJson: [{"text":"Where there is no vision, the people cast off restraint;","poem":1},{"text":"but blessed is he who keeps the Law.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Where there is no vision, the people cast off restraint; but blessed is he who keeps the Law.

contentJson: [{"text":"A servant cannot be corrected by words alone;","poem":1},{"text":"though he understands, he will not respond.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: A servant cannot be corrected by words alone; though he understands, he will not respond.

contentJson: [{"text":"Do you see a man who speaks in haste?","poem":1},{"text":"There is more hope for a fool than for him.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Do you see a man who speaks in haste? There is more hope for a fool than for him.

contentJson: [{"text":"A servant pampered from his youth","poem":1},{"text":"will bring grief in the end.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: A servant pampered from his youth will bring grief in the end.

contentJson: [{"text":"An angry man stirs up dissension,","poem":1},{"text":"and a hot-tempered man abounds in transgression.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: An angry man stirs up dissension, and a hot-tempered man abounds in transgression.

contentJson: [{"text":"A man’s pride will bring him low,","poem":1},{"text":"but a humble spirit will obtain honor.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: A man’s pride will bring him low, but a humble spirit will obtain honor.

contentJson: [{"text":"A partner to a thief hates his own soul;","poem":1},{"text":"he receives the oath, but does not testify.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: A partner to a thief hates his own soul; he receives the oath, but does not testify.

contentJson: [{"text":"The fear of man is a snare,","poem":1},{"text":"but whoever trusts in the LORD is set securely on high.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The fear of man is a snare, but whoever trusts in the LORD is set securely on high.

contentJson: [{"text":"Many seek the ruler’s favor,","poem":1},{"text":"but a man receives justice from the LORD.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Many seek the ruler’s favor, but a man receives justice from the LORD.

contentJson: [{"text":"An unjust man is detestable to the righteous,","poem":1},{"text":"and one whose way is upright is detestable to the wicked.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible

contentJson: ["These are the words of Agur son of Jakeh—the burden that this man declared to Ithiel:",{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"“I am weary, O God,","poem":1},{"text":"and worn out.","poem":2},{"noteId":80}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
These are the words of Agur son of Jakeh—the burden that this man declared to Ithiel: 
“I am weary, O God, and worn out.

contentJson: [{"text":"Surely I am the most ignorant of men,","poem":1},{"text":"and I lack the understanding of a man.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Surely I am the most ignorant of men, and I lack the understanding of a man.

contentJson: [{"text":"I have not learned wisdom,","poem":1},{"text":"and I have no knowledge of the Holy One.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: I have not learned wisdom, and I have no knowledge of the Holy One.

contentJson: [{"text":"Who has ascended to heaven and come down?","poem":1},{"text":"Who has gathered the wind in His hands?","poem":2},{"text":"Who has bound up the waters in His cloak?","poem":1},{"text":"Who has established all the ends of the earth?","poem":2},{"text":"What is His name, and what is the name of His Son—","poem":1},{"text":"surely you know!","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Who has ascended to heaven and come down? Who has gathered the wind in His hands? Who has bound up the waters in His cloak? Who has established all the ends of the earth? What is His name, and what is the name of His Son— surely you know!

contentJson: [{"text":"Every word of God is flawless;","poem":1},{"text":"He is a shield to those who take refuge in Him.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Every word of God is flawless; He is a shield to those who take refuge in Him.

contentJson: [{"text":"Do not add to His words,","poem":1},{"text":"lest He rebuke you and prove you a liar.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Do not add to His words, lest He rebuke you and prove you a liar.

contentJson: [{"text":"Two things I ask of You—","poem":1},{"text":"do not refuse me before I die:","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Two things I ask of You— do not refuse me before I die:

contentJson: [{"text":"Keep falsehood and deceitful words far from me.","poem":1},{"text":"Give me neither poverty nor riches;","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"feed me with the bread that is my portion.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
Keep falsehood and deceitful words far from me. Give me neither poverty nor riches; 
feed me with the bread that is my portion.

contentJson: [{"text":"Otherwise, I may have too much","poem":1},{"text":"and deny You, saying, ‘Who is the LORD?’","poem":2},{"text":"Or I may become poor and steal,","poem":1},{"text":"profaning the name of my God.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Otherwise, I may have too much and deny You, saying, ‘Who is the LORD?’ Or I may become poor and steal, profaning the name of my God.

contentJson: [{"text":"Do not slander a servant to his master,","poem":1},{"text":"or he will curse you, and you will bear the guilt.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Do not slander a servant to his master, or he will curse you, and you will bear the guilt.

contentJson: [{"text":"There is a generation of those who curse their fathers","poem":1},{"text":"and do not bless their mothers.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: There is a generation of those who curse their fathers and do not bless their mothers.

contentJson: [{"text":"There is a generation of those who are pure in their own eyes","poem":1},{"text":"and yet unwashed of their filth.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: There is a generation of those who are pure in their own eyes and yet unwashed of their filth.

contentJson: [{"text":"There is a generation—how haughty are their eyes","poem":1},{"text":"and pretentious are their glances—","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: There is a generation—how haughty are their eyes and pretentious are their glances—

contentJson: [{"text":"there is a generation whose teeth are swords","poem":1},{"text":"and whose jaws are knives,","poem":2},{"text":"devouring the oppressed from the earth","poem":1},{"text":"and the needy from among men.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: there is a generation whose teeth are swords and whose jaws are knives, devouring the oppressed from the earth and the needy from among men.

contentJson: [{"text":"The leech has two daughters:","poem":1},{"text":"Give and Give.","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},"There are three things that are never satisfied, four that never say, ‘Enough!’:"]

text:
The leech has two daughters: Give and Give. 
There are three things that are never satisfied, four that never say, ‘Enough!’:

contentJson: ["Sheol,",{"lineBreak":true},"the barren womb,",{"lineBreak":true},"land never satisfied with water,",{"lineBreak":true},"and fire that never says, ‘Enough!’"]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
Sheol, 
the barren womb, 
land never satisfied with water, 
and fire that never says, ‘Enough!’

contentJson: [{"text":"As for the eye that mocks a father","poem":1},{"text":"and scorns obedience to a mother,","poem":2},{"text":"may the ravens of the valley pluck it out","poem":1},{"text":"and young vultures devour it.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: As for the eye that mocks a father and scorns obedience to a mother, may the ravens of the valley pluck it out and young vultures devour it.

contentJson: ["There are three things too wonderful for me, four that I cannot understand:"]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: There are three things too wonderful for me, four that I cannot understand:

contentJson: ["the way of an eagle in the sky,",{"lineBreak":true},"the way of a snake on a rock,",{"lineBreak":true},"the way of a ship at sea,",{"lineBreak":true},"and the way of a man with a maiden."]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
the way of an eagle in the sky, 
the way of a snake on a rock, 
the way of a ship at sea, 
and the way of a man with a maiden.

contentJson: [{"text":"This is the way of an adulteress:","poem":1},{"text":"She eats and wipes her mouth","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"and says, ‘I have done nothing wrong.’","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
This is the way of an adulteress: She eats and wipes her mouth

contentJson: ["Under three things the earth trembles, under four it cannot bear up:"]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Under three things the earth trembles, under four it cannot bear up:

contentJson: ["a servant who becomes king,",{"lineBreak":true},"a fool who is filled with food,"]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
a servant who becomes king, 
a fool who is filled with food,

contentJson: ["an unloved woman who marries,",{"lineBreak":true},"and a maidservant who supplants her mistress."]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
an unloved woman who marries, 
and a maidservant who supplants her mistress.

contentJson: ["Four things on earth are small, yet they are exceedingly wise:"]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Four things on earth are small, yet they are exceedingly wise:

contentJson: ["The ants are creatures of little strength, yet they store up their food in the summer;"]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The ants are creatures of little strength, yet they store up their food in the summer;

contentJson: ["the rock badgers",{"noteId":81},"are creatures of little power, yet they make their homes in the rocks;"]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: the rock badgers are creatures of little power, yet they make their homes in the rocks;

contentJson: ["the locusts have no king, yet they all advance in formation;"]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: the locusts have no king, yet they all advance in formation;

contentJson: ["and the lizard can be caught in one’s hands, yet it is found in the palaces of kings."]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: and the lizard can be caught in one’s hands, yet it is found in the palaces of kings.

contentJson: ["There are three things that are stately in their stride, and four that are impressive in their walk:"]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: There are three things that are stately in their stride, and four that are impressive in their walk:

contentJson: ["a lion, mighty among beasts, refusing to retreat before anything;"]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: a lion, mighty among beasts, refusing to retreat before anything;

contentJson: ["a strutting rooster;",{"lineBreak":true},"a he-goat;",{"lineBreak":true},"and a king with his army around him.",{"noteId":82}]
name: Berean Standard Bible

contentJson: [{"text":"If you have foolishly exalted yourself","poem":1},{"text":"or if you have plotted evil,","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"put your hand over your mouth.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
If you have foolishly exalted yourself or if you have plotted evil, 
put your hand over your mouth.

contentJson: [{"text":"For as the churning of milk yields butter,","poem":1},{"text":"and the twisting of the nose draws blood,","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"so the stirring of anger brings forth strife.”","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
For as the churning of milk yields butter, and the twisting of the nose draws blood,

contentJson: ["These are the words of King Lemuel—the burden that his mother taught him:"]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: These are the words of King Lemuel—the burden that his mother taught him:

name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
What shall I say, O my son? What, O son of my womb?

contentJson: [{"text":"Do not spend your strength on women","poem":1},{"text":"or your vigor on those who ruin kings.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Do not spend your strength on women or your vigor on those who ruin kings.

contentJson: [{"text":"It is not for kings, O Lemuel,","poem":1},{"text":"it is not for kings to drink wine,","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"or for rulers to crave strong drink,","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
It is not for kings, O Lemuel, it is not for kings to drink wine, 
or for rulers to crave strong drink,

contentJson: [{"text":"lest they drink and forget what is decreed,","poem":1},{"text":"depriving all the oppressed of justice.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: lest they drink and forget what is decreed, depriving all the oppressed of justice.

contentJson: [{"text":"Give strong drink to one who is perishing,","poem":1},{"text":"and wine to the bitter in soul.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Give strong drink to one who is perishing, and wine to the bitter in soul.

contentJson: [{"text":"Let him drink and forget his poverty,","poem":1},{"text":"and remember his misery no more.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Let him drink and forget his poverty, and remember his misery no more.

contentJson: [{"text":"Open your mouth for those with no voice,","poem":1},{"text":"for the cause of all the dispossessed.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Open your mouth for those with no voice, for the cause of all the dispossessed.

contentJson: [{"text":"Open your mouth, judge righteously,","poem":1},{"text":"and defend the cause of the poor and needy.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Open your mouth, judge righteously, and defend the cause of the poor and needy.

contentJson: [{"text":"A wife","poem":1},{"noteId":84},{"text":"of noble character, who can find?","poem":1},{"text":"She is far more precious than rubies.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: A wife of noble character, who can find? She is far more precious than rubies.

contentJson: [{"text":"The heart of her husband trusts in her,","poem":1},{"text":"and he lacks nothing of value.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The heart of her husband trusts in her, and he lacks nothing of value.

contentJson: [{"text":"She brings him good and not harm","poem":1},{"text":"all the days of her life.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: She brings him good and not harm all the days of her life.

contentJson: [{"text":"She selects wool and flax","poem":1},{"text":"and works with eager hands.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible

contentJson: [{"text":"She is like the merchant ships,","poem":1},{"text":"bringing her food from afar.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: She is like the merchant ships, bringing her food from afar.

contentJson: [{"text":"She rises while it is still night","poem":1},{"text":"to provide food for her household","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"and portions for her maidservants.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
She rises while it is still night to provide food for her household

contentJson: [{"text":"She appraises a field and buys it;","poem":1},{"text":"from her earnings she plants a vineyard.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: She appraises a field and buys it; from her earnings she plants a vineyard.

contentJson: [{"text":"She girds herself","poem":1},{"noteId":85},{"text":"with strength","poem":1},{"text":"and shows that her arms are strong.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: She girds herself with strength and shows that her arms are strong.

contentJson: [{"text":"She sees that her gain is good,","poem":1},{"text":"and her lamp is not extinguished at night.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: She sees that her gain is good, and her lamp is not extinguished at night.

contentJson: [{"text":"She stretches out her hands to the distaff","poem":1},{"text":"and grasps the spindle with her fingers.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: She stretches out her hands to the distaff and grasps the spindle with her fingers.

contentJson: [{"text":"She opens her arms to the poor","poem":1},{"text":"and reaches out her hands to the needy.","poem":2}]

text: She opens her arms to the poor and reaches out her hands to the needy.

contentJson: [{"text":"When it snows, she has no fear for her household,","poem":1},{"text":"for they are all clothed in scarlet.","poem":2},{"noteId":86}]

text: When it snows, she has no fear for her household, for they are all clothed in scarlet.

text: “Many daughters have done noble things, but you surpass them all!”
